PublicRemarks: This charming 829 sqft ground-level unit offers an exceptional living experience with a fenced yard for added privacy. Situated in the well-established and wonderfully managed community of The Villages, this 1-bedroom, 1-full bathroom condo has been beautifully upgraded. Key Features: Modern Upgrades: Freshly painted soft gray walls and brand-new water-resistant luxury vinyl plank flooring throughout the unit. Spacious Living: The efficient layout creates an expansive feel, especially with the generous-sized bedroom and large living room filled with natural light. Updated Appliances: Newer HVAC, water heater, and washer/dryer, along with energy-efficient windows, ensure comfort and savings. The kitchen boasts a brand-new stainless-steel Steam-Cleaning Air Fry Convection Oven. Outdoor Living: Sliding glass doors open to a fully fenced yard, ideal for pets or hosting friends. Convenience: In-unit washer and dryer for added ease. Community Highlights: Prime Location: Located off Richmond Highway (U.S. Route 1), this home offers a peaceful retreat with all the amenities of city life nearby. Walking distance to restaurants, shops, parks, a gym, and bus stops. Proximity to Nature: Close to the Potomac River, Huntley Meadows Park, and Mount Vernon Mansion, offering beautiful trails for biking, jogging, and picnicking. Easy Commutes: Minutes from Fort Belvoir, I-95, and I-495, with convenient access to the Yellow Line Metro station for trips to downtown Alexandria, Old Town, or Washington, D.C. This unit is move-in ready with fantastic updates and an unbeatable location. Don’t miss out on this rare find!

AgentRemarks: Please schedule your showing online. There is a lockbox at the front door, and you will receive the combination from ShowingTime. The landlord requires excellent credit and an income that is at least four times the monthly rent.
PublicRemarks: This stunningly renovated 2-bedroom, 2-bath condo with a spacious loft is among the largest in the community! Nestled in the picturesque Lakeside community, residents enjoy amenities like a pool, dog park, tennis courts, playgrounds, and scenic waterside trails. The home features a bright and open floor plan with numerous updated windows and high ceilings. The eat-in kitchen is equipped with Corian countertops, ample white cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, a breakfast bar, and a convenient pass-through to the dining and living areas—perfect for hosting guests. The sun-drenched living room features a charming corner wood-burning fireplace, vaulted ceilings with a new skylight, and sliding glass doors that lead to a spacious balcony. The loft area, complete with a ceiling fan and storage, offers the perfect space for a home office. The large primary bedroom boasts vaulted ceilings, a walk-in closet, and private balcony access. The updated en-suite bathroom includes a separate vanity area. Step onto the expansive balcony, which includes additional storage and offers breathtaking views of the lake. This home also provides ample visitor parking. Conveniently located just inside the beltway, about 1 mile from the Mosaic District and Dunn Loring Metro, and 4 miles from Tysons Corner, with easy access to I-495, Route 29, Route 50, and I-66. Don’t miss the opportunity to live in this serene community with beautiful lakes, trails, a pool, playgrounds, and tennis courts!

AgentRemarks: Property also available for sale. Discover this gorgeous, centrally located 3-level townhome featuring 3 bedrooms and 3.5 baths. The updated kitchen boasts expansive stone counters, ample cabinet space, recessed lighting, a stainless steel French door refrigerator, and a convenient pantry. Enjoy your morning coffee on the Trex deck, accessible through French doors, while taking in serene tree views. The living and dining areas are enhanced by a double-sided gas fireplace with a custom wraparound mantel, complemented by exposed brick for added warmth. Gleaming hardwood floors and fresh paint throughout add a modern touch. Each bedroom includes its own private en-suite bath for maximum comfort and privacy. The upper-level master suite offers a luxurious 5-piece bath with a jetted soaking porcelain tub and shower, and a  Toto automatic toilet, creating a perfect retreat to unwind after a long day. The lower-level bedroom opens to a private, fenced area, providing a secluded outdoor space. Additional features include a bonus garage with inside access. Ideally located for commuters, this home offers easy access to I-395, DC, the Pentagon, Amazon HQ2, Columbia Pike, Shirlington, the WO&D Trail, parks, shops, and restaurants.

PublicRemarks: Gorgeous & Updated 3-level townhome in popular Stonehurst! Prepared to be wowed! This beauty offers refinished hardwood flooring throughout the main & upper levels as well as both staircases and offers engineered flooring in the lower level, cleaning will be a breeze! A new renovated kitchen is at your fingertips, complete with new White Shaker cabinetry, spacious pantry, new quartz countertops, subway tile backsplash and stainless steel appliances. New recessed lighting throughout.  A lovely dining room is positioned towards the front of the home and takes in a beautiful bay window that can also serve as a buffet for larger gatherings or a sunny spot for your houseplants. The spacious living room is just off the kitchen  perfectly sized for a variety of seating arrangements and showcases a gorgeous picture window taking in the rear courtyard views, you'll enjoy all of the blooming trees and gardens. There is  a conveniently placed updated powder room on the main level for guests and a handy coat closet. The upper level showcases two grand bedrooms, each with ample closet space and both host full bathrooms. One of the bathrooms has been recently fully renovated in upscale finishes. The other full bath has been refreshed in recent years. The lower level of this home hosts a cozy recreation room, with a wide set of French doors looking out to the courtyard for maximum daylight, a gorgeous brick wood burning fireplace warms up the space in chilly days and a half bath is located down the hall. Another coat closet is offered as well as a large storage room, which includes the washer and dryer (laundry tub in as-is condition). Roof 2018, new flu liner for the fireplace in 2021, renovated kitchen 2023, renovated powder room and one upper bath 2022, refinished hardwood flooring and stairs 2022, new paint 2022.  New Flu liner for the fireplace, 2021. Windows have been replaced, outside HVAC 2015. A superb location walkable to the new Giant Food, close shopping in Fairfax, Vienna, and the Mosaic District  as well as a myriad of restaurants and shopping opportunities. A short 1-mile walk to the Vienna/Fairfax GMU Metro Station! A conveniently placed bus stop is at the entrance of the community, and several parks nearby. This home has been meticulously maintained and turn key ready for its new owners! Welcome home!

PublicRemarks: Stunning and light-filled 2 bedroom, 2 bath end unit condo boasting 1545 sq ft with PREMIUM WATER VIEWS in the desirable 55+ active adult community of Montebello Farm.  This newly constructed condo (2022) offers turn-key and one level living at its best in this secure elevator building.  Featuring designer finishes throughout with luxury vinyl plank flooring,  oversized windows with custom top-down/bottom up shades that showcase the natural light and gorgeous lake views from the expansive living room and primary suite.  The open concept kitchen is an entertainer’s delight featuring upgraded cabinets, a large center island with seating and Quartz countertops, pendant & recessed lights, pantry, ceramic cooktop w/ hood, a wall oven with a built-in microwave.  Enjoy morning coffee on your large, covered balcony  w/ views of the community garden.  Wake up each morning to lake views from your primary bedroom w/ upgraded carpeting before you retreat to your spa-like primary bath with gorgeous 12x24 designer tile floor, over-sized frameless shower w/ bench seating, generous dual vanity sink cabinet w/ quartz countertops and linen closet.  Bedroom 2 has a beautiful full bath with walk-in shower and is ideally located on a separate wing from the primary bedroom offering maximum privacy.  The walk-in laundry room is generous in size and offers cabinets for additional storage.  Don’t miss the storage locker #8 located on the main lobby level.   Residents enjoy access to the amazing 14,000 sq ft Clubhouse which includes access to:  indoor pool and spa, outdoor pool, gym, game room, demonstration kitchen, basketball court, pickleball & bocce ball courts, outdoor grills & firepit, playground and walking trails. Conveniently located close to shopping, restaurants, healthcare, Dulles International Airport and just 7 miles to the Ashburn Metro Station.  Monthly HOA & Condo fee are included in monthly rent and cover water, trash, common area maintenance, lawn care, snow removal & access to the Clubhouse, pools, & gym

AgentRemarks: Please contact Sharon with Bay Property Management Group at scail@bmgnva.com or call 703-843-6495 with any questions you have about the property.  Please Direct Your Clients To https://baymgmtgroupnorthvirginia.appfolio.com/listings To Pay For And Fill Out The Rental Application. PETSCREENING IS A PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable. Owner will consider 1 small-medium cat or dog on a case by case basis. No reptiles, spiders, caged rodents, monkeys, or small farm animals. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

PublicRemarks: Experience the epitome of urban living in this rare gem – a modern boutique 1,300 square foot condo boasting 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms. Nestled within the highly coveted Hartford building (only 70 total units), this residence offers an exceptional lifestyle in the heart of Clarendon. Step inside to discover the warmth of bamboo floors, complemented by fresh paint that breathes new life into every corner. The brand new carpets add a touch of luxury to your living spaces. This residence beckons you to unwind on its private balcony, providing captivating views of Lyon Village and Clarendon. The elegance continues with recessed lighting illuminating your path and a master suite featuring a relaxing Jacuzzi tub. Convenience takes center stage as garage parking ensures your vehicle's safety and in-unit washer and dryer simplify daily chores. Situated within a stone's throw of Clarendon Metro, Trader Joe's, and a vibrant array of restaurants, this condo offers an unbeatable location for city enthusiasts. Delight in the pulse of the neighborhood, from dining to nightlife, all within easy walking distance. Plus, for families, there is a childcare center conveniently located just across the street. This partially furnished unit welcomes you to an urban retreat that encapsulates Clarendon's vibrant spirit. Discover the allure of this exceptional home today. Please note: No pets or smoking allowed. A minimum credit score of 650 and an annual income of at least 40 times the monthly rent are required to qualify. Occupancy limited to no more than 2 unrelated parties. Don't miss out – seize the opportunity now!

The fenced backyard adds an extra level of privacy. With a large kitchen, a spacious master bedroom, and a generous mudroom, this home is perfect for both daily living and entertaining. Truly a stay-at-home resort for family & friends!

AgentRemarks: Sentrilock. Tenant Occupied. Please make an appointment online. The new tenant can move in the middle of October if needed. Welcome to 2698 Myrtlewood! As you enter this beautiful 4 bedroom, 3 1/2 bath single-family home, you will be greeted by the two-story foyer. The wood floors flow from the main level office/study and flow easily from the formal living and formal dining. AgentRemarks: For Sale or Rent: ( please contact agent) Step inside this newly renovated 2-bed, 1-bath condo where luxury and practicality harmonize perfectly! Positioned on the ground floor, this corner unit is bathed in natural light, boasting a roomy layout and tasteful finishes. Upon entry, you're greeted by graceful arched doorways and a bonus office nook, catering to remote workers or anyone in need of a creative corner. Fresh vinyl plank flooring and crisp painted walls adorn the entire space, infusing it with a contemporary and inviting vibe. The focal point is the open-plan living area, seamlessly merging the living room, dining space, and kitchen. The bedroom serves as a serene sanctuary, featuring its own ensuite bath and generous closet space. A built-in desk with shelves offers a practical home office solution. Step out onto the covered balcony for a breath of fresh air. The Bryson At Woodland Park community spoils residents with resort-style amenities, such as two pools, communal grill spots, a spacious party room, fitness and business centers. With one designated parking spot, parking headaches are a thing of the past. Additional spaces are available for rent if needed. Nestled near the new metro silver line, Reston town center, and an array of shopping, dining, and entertainment options, this condo seamlessly blends suburban serenity with urban accessibility. Whether commuting to work or immersing yourself in the local scene, this is the ultimate place to call home. Notes: Yearly Preventive Maintenance Inspection : 1. Water Heater - good until October 2024 2. HVAC/Dryer Vent - good until June 2025

AgentRemarks: Appt. Required via ShowingTime Online. Please see MLS documents for helpful touring information as well as application instructions. Weekend showings more flexible**Home tenant occupied** Please contact Darious with Bay Property Management Group at dcroom@bmgnva.com or call 240-786-2220 with any questions you have about the property. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable. Owner will consider pet(s) on a case by case basis. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

PublicRemarks: AVAILABLE NOVEMBER 1ST. Welcome to your dream home in a prime location! This stunning townhouse boasts 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, and a convenient half bath, all beautifully spread across three meticulously maintained levels. As you step inside, you’ll be greeted by gleaming refinished hardwood floors that flow seamlessly throughout the entire home. The heart of this home is its incredible kitchen, a culinary haven with upgraded cabinets, striking granite countertops, chic backsplashes, and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. Start your mornings with a freshly brewed cup from your very own coffee bar, and savor the ease of cooking in this stylish space. The open-concept living and dining area is perfect for both everyday living and entertaining. The space is bathed in natural light, accentuated by recessed lighting, and features a walkout to the inviting back deck—ideal for enjoying warm, sunny days and tranquil evenings. Retreat to the bedrooms, each featuring elegant vaulted ceilings and ample space. The hall bath has been exquisitely updated with textured subway tiles, a granite-top vanity, and fresh, modern cabinetry.  The main bedroom is a true sanctuary, complete with a generous walk-in closet, a separate dressing area, and a luxurious en-suite bath featuring a walk-in shower with a frameless glass door. An additional bedroom on the lower level provides privacy and convenience, accompanied by a full bath and a large recreation room with a cozy gas fireplace—perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The recreation room opens up to the backyard, where you can enjoy outdoor gatherings on the charming stone patio. A dedicated laundry room with front-loading washer and dryer adds to the home's practicality. Two assigned parking spots (#5 and #6) ensure you'll always have a place to park. Located near Kingstowne and the I-495 Van Dorn exit, this home combines comfort, luxury, and a fantastic location. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this exceptional townhouse your own! The owner reserves one storage room for building materials and personal belongings.

PublicRemarks: Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to rent a stunning end-unit townhouse in the highly desirable Port Aquia community! This beautifully designed three-level home features a spacious foyer and family room on the ground floor, along with convenient garage access and a sliding door that opens to a fenced backyard. The second level showcases a large living and dining area with access to a charming deck—perfect for relaxing and enjoying the outdoors. Gorgeous end-unit townhouse in the highly sought-after Brambleton community! This beautiful home offers privacy, backing onto a wooded oasis and situated at the quiet end of the neighborhood on a cul-de-sac. The large gourmet kitchen includes granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, upgraded cabinets, and a spacious center island, opening to a generous eat-in area, dining/family room, and a cozy gas fireplace. Step out onto the deck from the family room, which overlooks a private, fenced yard with trees. Community amenities include cable/internet, trash/recycling, five pools, jogging/walking trails, and courts for basketball, volleyball, and tennis. Enjoy close proximity to Brambleton Town Center with its stores, restaurants, movie theater, and library, as well as the Dulles Greenway. PublicRemarks: Indulge in the ultimate luxury living experience at The Verse, an elite community designed for discerning tastes. This stunning  and serene 2-bedroom, 2-bath penthouse condo with a den spans 1,476 square feet and boasts breathtaking panoramic views from Alexandria to downtown D.C., capturing unforgettable sunrises and sunsets from each bedroom and all the public spaces within the home. The contemporary design features oversized windows and high ceilings, filling the open-concept space with natural light. The custom-designed kitchen is a chef's delight, with signature Italian cabinetry, quartz countertops, full height backsplash, a large composite stone island with integrated dining, and stainless steel Bosch appliances. The living area offers ample space for entertaining, while the primary suite features a luxurious bath with a double vanity, Calcutta marble stone on floors/walls, a frameless shower with an integrated bench, Italian cabinetry, and a custom walk-in closet. An additional bedroom with stunning views, a den perfect for a home office, another opulent full bathroom, luxury hardwoods throughout, and a laundry room complete the unit. The Verse offers a wealth of amenities, including 24/7 concierge services, a rooftop pool and lounge, a state-of-the-art fitness center, pet spa,  rooftop terrace,  yoga studio, skypark with kitchen and bar, gas grills, outdoor dining areas, and TV screens. Discover a world of leisure on Level 9. Indulge in the lawn area with amenities like badminton and outdoor movies. Enjoy the central covered kitchen equipped with gas grills and a bar, surrounded by outdoor living and dining rooms. Immerse yourself in the serene courtyards framed by garden walls and fire pits. Residents also enjoy a grand entertainment lounge, pet spa, and an all-season terrace. Located in the heart of Tysons, The Verse is conveniently situated above The Boro's premier shopping, dining , and fitness centers, with Whole Foods, coffee shops, restaurants, an ICON Movie Theater, and so much more. You never have to leave The Boro. The Greensboro Metro Station, just 0.3 miles away, provides easy access to Washington D.C. and Dulles International Airport on the Silver Line. This penthouse offers an unparalleled lifestyle of luxury and convenience. 2 parking spaces and a storage locker included.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this spectacular four-level end-unit townhome with breathtaking views of the Potomac River from the rooftop deck! Located in the highly sought-after "Potomac Shores" neighborhood, this stunning property is an Energy Star Certified Home built by Beazer Homes in 2021. It offers unparalleled luxury with over $134,000 in upgrades and is like new. Upon entry through the covered porch, a spacious foyer greets you with a stylish valet bench. This level includes a guest suite with a full ensuite bathroom and additional storage. A bright study, perfect for a home office, workout space, or playroom, benefits from ample natural light. Access this level through the large rear-entry two-car garage, which also offers additional storage space. The main level features an open floor plan and a gourmet kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances, a double wall oven, gas cooktop, quartz countertops, pendant and recessed lighting, ample storage, and a spacious pantry. Enjoy casual meals on the large kitchen island or in the adjacent dining area, which opens to a covered terrace with water views. The great room, filled with natural light and featuring an upgraded fireplace with a tile wall, provides a perfect space for relaxation. A stylish powder room adds to the convenience of this level. The third floor hosts the primary bedroom, complete with a luxurious ensuite bathroom and a large walk-in closet. The ensuite bath includes a raised dual vanity and a large tiled shower with a bench and glass door. This floor also has a large laundry room, second and third bedrooms, and a third full bathroom with a dual vanity. Throughout the home, designer vinyl plank flooring and recessed lighting enhance every room. The top floor presents a spectacular finished bonus room, ideal for use as a home theater, craft space, or whatever your heart desires—the possibilities are endless! This room leads to the rooftop terrace, offering stunning Potomac River views, perfect for entertaining or unwinding. Residents enjoy numerous community amenities covered by HOA fees, including Verizon high-speed FIOS internet, trash removal, multiple pools, a clubhouse, fitness center, hiking/biking trails, multi-purpose sports courts, and the Jack Nicklaus Signature golf course. Additional amenities include a sports complex, canoe club, fitness barn with a state-of-the-art gym, a clubhouse, a working greenhouse, a movement studio, a yoga lawn, tot lots, tennis and basketball courts, and both competition and family pools with a sundeck and cabanas. Conveniently located near I-95, US-1, Quantico, and an upcoming VRE station less than half a mile away, this home offers unmatched convenience and lifestyle options. The neighborhood boasts new schools, shops, and dining options, making it a thriving community. Experience the ultimate in Potomac Shores living—schedule your tour today and explore the limitless possibilities this home offers. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity—make an offer today!

PublicRemarks: Welcome home! This home is a 3 Bedroom/2 Full & 2 Half Bath townhouse in Colony Park! It has been Fully Renovated and has luxury vinyl plank floors and recessed lighting on the main level. The kitchen features white cabinetry, granite counters, subway tile backsplash, and stainless-steel appliances, including a new flat-top range and a bay window with plantation shutters and a breakfast nook. The dining room has chair rail and crown molding, while the spacious living room also features crown molding. Sliding glass doors open to a fenced yard backing to trees and common grounds. The home has a large ground-level deck with built-in planters.  There is a half bath in the foyer on the main level. The upper level includes a spacious primary bedroom with 3 dormer windows and has new carpeting, dual closets and an updated Primary bath. There are two more bedrooms and a hall bath with a tub/shower. All bedrooms have plantation shutters and lighted ceiling fans. The finished basement Living Area offers a spacious living space with a wood-surround fireplace , a Large  window with plantation shutters provides plenty of light in the area. There is also a  half bath and a large storage/laundry/utility room on this level. The house has a new roof and HVAC system.   Assigned parking is close to the home and additional parking is located along Colony View Drive. Colony Park community has a  community pool, basketball and tennis courts, and a playground.  The Burke Centre Virginia Railway Express is less than a mile away! You will have access to shopping, restaurants and outdoor activities within minutes of the home! This is a very Beautiful home in the very desirable Colony Park Community!

PublicRemarks: Welcome home to this gorgeous brick end-unit townhome that backs to a serene wooded view. Over $75k in updates throughout, including a glorious primary suite and remodeled kitchen with white Shaker-front cabinets, stainless steel appliances, and granite counters. The first floor features hardwood floors, a spacious dining room, a conveniently located powder room, and an expansive living room with a wood-burning fireplace, built-in shelving, and views of the trees. The upper level is home to three bedrooms and two full baths, including the primary suite with its spacious bedroom with a walk-in closet with custom organizers, and a remodeled en-suite bathroom with a glass enclosed shower, soaking tub, and double vanity.  The walk-out finished lower level boasts a dedicated laundry room, a full bathroom, a family room with a wood-burning fireplace and sliding doors to the charming brick patio, and a 4th bedroom/home office with its own entrance. The spacious side yard, a unique amenity in Briary Farms, provides four raised beds and an opportunity to showcase your green thumb and garden to your heart's content. The home features two assigned parking out front and includes access to the community pool, tennis court, and tot lot. Trash, recycling, and snow removal are also included in the monthly rent. Tenants cover all utilities (gas, electricity, and water/sewer). The home is located a short distance from the local farmers' market (generally open May-November), Sherwood Hall Library, grocery stores, the Mount Vernon trail, Little Hunting Creek, and more. The location offers convenient commuting options as it's close to major transportation routes, Huntington Metro station with commuter parking, DC, Ft. Belvoir, the Pentagon, and Reagan National Airport. The home is available for immediate occupancy. Lease terms of 12 months only please, and pets are not accepted. Applications are submitted online, and there is a $50 non-refundable application fee per adult. The first full month's rent and security deposit are due at lease signing.

PublicRemarks: Available for rent - an Arlington gem! This beautiful open concept single family home has been fully renovated, in a super sought after Arlington location, and has an amazing backyard perfect for entertaining or loads of activities. This home is super walkable to so many Arlington favorites including High View Park (along with three other parks — Lacey Woods, Slater Park, and Langston - Brown Park), Virginia Hospital Center, Glebe Elementary, Trinity Presbyterian Preschool. It’s also minutes from Ballston Quarter and Clarendon, Cafe Colline (3 min drive!), Arrow Wine, Chipotle, Heidelberg Bakery, and many other shops and delicious restaurants.  The home features many smart upgrades including smart light switches, Vivint security system, motion detectors, Nest thermostats, and keyless entry. Upstairs in the home you’ll find 3 bedrooms and 2 full baths, with an additional bedroom downstairs and another full bath. The main level has ample living space, a great kitchen island, chef appliances, large slider door to back patio, half bath, and the entire house has tons of closet space. The basement level also features a mud area entryway off of the driveway — perfect for coming home and dropping all of your things without getting the rest of the house dirty! This home and neighborhood truly has it all! Short Term 6 month lease available/ok. Landlord open to 6-24 month lease. Pets allowed. Tenant pays all utilities. Estimated Sq Footage 3K total -- aprox 2K above grade; 1K below grade.

PublicRemarks: This is a professionally managed property where you will enjoy our FREE Resident Benefits Package! Included are two ways to pay your rent electronically, online maintenance requests as well as an online portal through which you can access important information such as your monthly statement, your Lease and your Association guidelines where applicable. This stunning home exudes timeless elegance with its large brick front and classic colonial architecture, offering a blend of sophistication and comfort. Boasting four bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms, it provides ample space for families or individuals seeking refined living. Upon arrival, you're greeted by the allure of a side-entry two-car garage, seamlessly integrated into the design for convenience. The expansive yard invites outdoor enjoyment, complemented by an impressive patio perfect for hosting gatherings or simply relaxing in the open air. Step inside to discover a gourmet kitchen that will inspire culinary delights and features granite countertops, a pantry for ample storage and a breakfast bar for casual dining. Adjacent to the kitchen, a formal dining room awaits, providing an ideal setting for intimate dinners or festive occasions. Unwind in the spacious living room, where natural light pours in through large windows, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The family room, conveniently located off the kitchen, boasts skylights that bathe the room in sunlight, while a fireplace offers a cozy focal point for gatherings during cooler evenings. Retreat to the primary bedroom suite, a luxurious haven complete with an en suite bathroom featuring a separate shower, a sumptuous soaking tub, and a double sink vanity, ensuring comfort and convenience. Three additional bedrooms offer ample space for family members or guests, each thoughtfully designed with comfort in mind. The lower level of the home provides even more space for relaxation and entertainment, featuring a spacious layout with a wet bar for serving drinks and snacks, as well as a full bathroom for added convenience. With its blend of classic charm and modern amenities, this home offers a truly exceptional living experience, providing comfort, style, and functionality in every detail. The home is close to schools, Tysons shopping, restaurants and entertainment and major access routes.

This Frankton model is thoughtfully designed for modern living with top-of-the-line features and finishes. As you approach, you'll be greeted by its impressive curb appeal and welcoming elevation. The lower level offers luxury vinyl plank flooring in the recreation room, a spacious storage area, and convenient access to an oversized two-car rear-load garage. On the main level, the gourmet kitchen shines with a KitchenAid stainless steel appliance package, gas oven range, quartz countertops, a large farmhouse sink, and a massive island with sleek, modern cabinetry. The open-concept layout seamlessly connects the kitchen, living room, and a spacious Trex deck—perfect for entertaining guests. Upstairs, you’ll find three generous bedrooms with upgraded padding and carpet, along with a convenient laundry room featuring an upgraded washer and dryer. The primary suite is a standout, boasting a custom accent wall, a spacious walk-in closet, dual sinks, and a luxurious walk-in shower. This home is just steps away from popular dining options like Chick-fil-A, Foster's Grille, Aldie, Walmart, planet fitness and Crumbl Cookie, as well as the vibrant Downtown Haymarket. With easy access to major interstates, commuter lots, and Dulles International Airport, this location offers the ultimate in convenience. Schedule your private tour today and make this stunning home yours before it's gone!

PublicRemarks: MOVE IN READY and CLOSE TO ALL AMENITIES!  This exceptional 3-bed, 3.5-bath END-UNIT townhome in the award winning community of Potomac Shores, featured in the Washingtonian Magazine as one of the Great Places to Live is available FOR RENT. Impeccably maintained and in pristine condition, this home allows you to step right into luxury living.  The LOCATION OF THIS HOME IS IDEAL! Situated in the future town center district, it offers unbeatable nearby amenities, proximity to the Jack Nicklaus Signature Golf Course, Tidewater Grill, and Shores Club, and thoughtful upgrades like engineered flooring fresh paint, and NEW carpet. A welcoming courtyard feel and tree-lined views greet you, setting the stage for the beauty within. The versatile flex room on the entry level offers endless possibilities as a quiet sitting room, playroom, office, or workout space. On the second level, you'll find the heart of the home—a bright, open layout with a spacious gathering room, cafe, and upgraded kitchen. The kitchen features a sizable center island with breakfast bar and seating for 6, stainless steel appliances, a gas cooktop paired with a vented hood, and a built-in buffet, making it a haven for those who love to cook and entertain. An impressive large walk-in pantry enhances the kitchen's functionality and appeal. Step out onto the deck off the kitchen and indulge in outdoor living at its finest, perfect for entertaining guests or enjoying a quiet morning coffee. On the upper level you'll find the primary suite and two additional bedrooms, all with ceiling fans and NEW carpet. The primary bathroom boasts a large walk-in shower, an expansive dual sink vanity, a separate water closet, and a generous walk-in closet. This level also includes a full hall bath, a convenient laundry area, and storage area. Before you walk out, don't miss the finished 2-car garage with epoxy floors and Ryobi rack system. The utility closet is conveniently located in the garage. The HOA fee paid by the landlords INCLUDES high speed internet, trash, and world class amenities. The community's motto is Get ready to LOVE WHERE YOU LIVE because there is something for everyone: play a round of golf at the Jack Nicholas inspired, public golf course right across the street, meet for cocktails at the clubhouse, run, bike or walk on the 9+ mile trails, launch a kayak, garden in the community garden, workout, do yoga, or swim at the Fitness Barn facility, attend a social gathering at the Social Barn, or join one of the many social clubs. It is all amazing! A 3rd pool and 2nd event space in the community  opened last summer! Covington-Harper Elementary School, Potomac Shores Middle School, and John Paul The Great private high school are conveniently located within the community, along with the Ali Krieger Sports Complex. Exciting future plans for the community include a planned VRE station and Town Center. Reasonable commutes to Quantico, Ft. Belvoir, and The Pentagon w/multiple commuting options. Commuting to Quantico is super easy as it's just 8 miles South on Rt 1. To get to Ft. Belvoir or the Pentagon, you can access the I-95 Express Lanes in 5 min., or park at one of the nearby commuter lots and take the PRTC bus, slug, or take the VRE (Virginia Rail Express). The combination of this beautiful home, its LOCATION IN THE COMMUNITY and all the amenities available in Potomac Shores makes this a wonderful place to call home. Schedule a showing right away!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your new home, nestled in the heart of Gainesville, where beauty, comfort, and convenience come together seamlessly. This amazing villa boasts an open concept with a spacious first-floor living area and an elegant Master Suite. As you step inside, you'll be greeted by an expansive open floor plan, complete with vaulted ceilings and high-end finishes throughout. The main level features stunning hardwood floors, adding warmth and sophistication to every step. The luxurious master suite is also on the main level, featuring a beautifully remodeled bath that serves as your personal oasis. The remodeled kitchen is a chef’s dream, with gleaming countertops and custom cabinetry, providing ample space to create delicious meals. The open layout flows effortlessly into the living and dining areas, making this home ideal for entertaining friends and family. At 3,623 square feet, this is one of the largest townhomes in the area, offering single-family-style living without the hassle of exterior maintenance. Upstairs, you’ll discover two very spacious bedrooms, an adjoining loft area, and a full bath, offering both comfort and privacy for you and your guests. The lower level is a haven for relaxation and entertainment, featuring a large walk-up recreation room that leads to a fenced-in yard—perfect for outdoor gatherings. The private deck off the kitchen overlooks mature trees and a serene pond, creating a peaceful atmosphere to unwind after a busy day. Located in the private, wooded community of Somerset, this home offers a tranquil retreat away from the hustle and bustle of Northern Virginia. With easy access to major commuting routes, nature trails, and a playground, it strikes the perfect balance between convenience and relaxation.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 501 S. Lexington St. in Glencarlyn - one of Arlington's best neighborhoods! This 5BR, 4.5BA house has about 3,500 sf of finished space (more than the tax record shows). Fresh paint throughout, and all carpet is brand new! ++++++ PLEASE REMOVE SHOES WHEN VISITING TO KEEP THE FLOORS CLEAN +++++ The Kitchen features high-quality appliances. The first two floors are served by a tankless gas hot water heater, which provides unlimited hot water on demand! The third floor has its own electric hot water heater. The main level has a spacious Living Room, Kitchen, Family Room, Dining Room, Den, and Powder Room. +++++ The second level has the giant Primary Bedroom, newly-updated Primary Bath (brand new shower just installed!), Second Bedroom with en suite Bath, Third Bedroom, Hall Bath, and Laundry Room. +++++ The Third Floor has two additional Bedrooms, a full Bath, a large Rec Room, and ample extra storage space. The attached garage provides parking for one car and additional storage. There is a lift that connects the Garage to the Living Room door. +++++ The yard is beautifully landscaped and hardscaped, and features a huge Deck which is accessed from the Living Room and Family Room. +++++ LANDSCAPE SERVICE INCLUDED IN RENT +++++ Two zone climate control will keep you comfortable all winter and summer! +++++ HVAC SERVICE AND FILTER SERVICE INCLUDED IN RENT +++++ The house is served by a water-softening system that handles Arlington's notoriously hard water! Shower in peace! No residue in your pots! +++++ WATER SYSTEM SERVICE INCLUDED IN RENT +++++ The best amenity of all is the neighborhood! Glencarlyn is a beautiful and active community, and at its center are the Carlin Hall community house with playground, and the Glencarlyn Branch of the Arlington County Library, which is surrounded by the gorgeous Glencarlyn Community Garden. Just four short blocks away is Glencarlyn Park, which connects to the Arlington County trail system (The W&OD and Four Mile Run Trails pass through). Also in the park are the Long Branch Nature Center, the Glencarlyn Dog Park, and another large playground. There is no better place to live in Arlington!

AgentRemarks: Schedule online. Instructions for access to property in ShowingTime. See Doc Manager for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option. FAST Application  Processing. $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication, and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured.  NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will consider two pets, dogs under 30 pounds.  You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card).   If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

AgentRemarks: Back on the market!! 🏡 Stunningly Renovated Cottage Style Home in Rosemont/Braddock Heights! 🏡 Welcome to this light-filled and elegantly renovated home boasting three bedrooms and two bathrooms. This charming Cottage Style home has been outfitted with designer finishes throughout, creating a perfect blend of modern comfort and classic charm. As you step inside, an open and airy floor plan welcomes you, providing the ideal space for both relaxation and entertainment. The primary suite is a true retreat, featuring a newly renovated bath, offering the perfect place to unwind after a long day. The heart of the home is accentuated by a gorgeous fireplace, creating an inviting backdrop for casual conversations and cozy evenings. The enormous floored attic provides extensive storage space, ensuring that organization is effortless. Outside, the home features a beautifully fenced yard on a corner lot, offering privacy and space for outdoor activities. The backyard patio is ideal for al fresco dining, providing a perfect spot for enjoying the beautiful surroundings. This home also boasts a newer roof and gutters, ensuring peace of mind for years to come. Additionally, the AC and furnace were replaced in July 2021, providing modern comfort and efficiency. Conveniently located within walking distance to Fairlington Centre, where you can find shops, dining, and more. Plus, with its proximity to the METRO, this home offers easy access to everything the area has to offer. Don't miss the opportunity to make this stunningly renovated home your own and experience the best of Rosemont/Braddock Heights living!

AgentRemarks: Please contact Sharon with Bay Property Management Group at scail@bmgnva.com or call 703-843-6495 with any questions you have about the property. Please Direct Your Clients To https://baymgmtgroupnorthvirginia.appfolio.com/listings To Pay For And Fill Out The Rental Application. PETSCREENING IS A PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable. Owner will consider 1 cat or small dog on a case by case basis. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to the Alta Vista Condominium, Large 1 bedroom on the 17th floor. This unit has laminate floors, an open kitchen, and excellent closet space in the master bedroom. The floor kitchen features granite countertops, custom backsplash, and a pass-through window into the living room. The living room and dining room are separate and both receive excellent natural light from the floor-to-ceiling glass windows. The living room leads out to the sunroom that has fantastic views of north Arlington. The master bedroom comes with two large closets. AgentRemarks: This property is also listed for sale. VALO2077934   Owner will consider lease/purchase. Application is online with RentSpree. Tenant pays social membership fee of $110 per month.  Nestled within the picturesque River Creek, Northern Virginia’s premier gated golf course community, this spacious Renaissance home is designed to fulfill all your home desires. As you step through the front door of this Grand Botticelli home, you're greeted by a striking curved staircase, a grand two-story foyer, and a charming, screened porch at the rear of the house. The interior boasts elegant, scraped Hickory hardwood floors, plantation shutters, and sophisticated, updated lighting throughout. The formal living and dining rooms, located just off the foyer, provide an ideal setting for entertaining guests. At the back of the home, the informal spaces include a cozy family room with built-in shelving, a gas fireplace, and plush, top of the line carpeting. The heart of the home, the kitchen, is perfectly positioned in the rear, featuring a breakfast room with a wall of windows that floods the room with natural light and a central island with seating. It’s a chef’s dream, equipped with stainless steel appliances including a newer KitchenAid dishwasher (2023). The kitchen also boasts a five-burner gas cooktop, Santa Cecilia granite countertops, and a tumbled travertine marble backsplash plus under cabinet lighting.  Additionally, there’s a versatile a bonus room that can be customized as an office, study, or playroom and located close to the back staircase with access to the laundry room and garage.  Upstairs features four bedrooms, three full bathrooms, and access to a rooftop terrace and a spacious loft area for lounging. Hardwood floors continue throughout the hallways and bedrooms two, three and four plus the loft area.   The primary suite is a true retreat, complete with a gas fireplace, plantation shutters, a wet bar with a beverage refrigerator, glass-front cabinets and access to the rooftop terrace. The primary hallway has two walk-in closets with ample space for your expansive wardrobe, a linen closet and a spacious bathroom retreat with a soaking tub, separate shower, and dual vanities.   The lower level will allow you to unwind in the open and spacious recreation room with rough-in plumbing for a future wet bar. There is also a quiet den, ideal for a home office, and a full bath. An unfinished room on this level offers the potential to be transformed into a custom exercise or media room. Plenty of storage space is also available in the utility room.  The lower-level HVAC system was replaced in October 2019.  Outside, the home is perfect for entertaining, with a screened porch, deck, stone patio, and rooftop terrace—ideal for summer cookouts or simply enjoying the fresh air. With $50,000 in updates this year, this is the perfect home to move in and make it your own!  It is ideally situated near the River Creek clubhouses, where you'll find the heart of community life. Residents can take advantage of tennis courts, swimming pools, fitness centers, and a variety of dining options. The community also offers basketball and volleyball courts, pickleball courts, a park with cozy fireplaces, picnic areas, a tot lot, and a launch spot for canoes and kayaks. For those with a green thumb, Confluence Park provides fenced garden plots available for rent. Golf enthusiasts can elevate their experience with a golf membership, granting access to one of the region's most scenic courses, featuring eight breathtaking holes along the Potomac River and Goose Creek. Be sure to ask for a tour of the club and golf course! You will delight in your close access to Dulles Airport, the Greenway, and Rt 7.  Enjoy Historic Leesburg with its abundance of dining options and entertainment! Close by you will find a multitude of wineries and breweries plus Morven Park, a private 1000-acre park open to the public!

This end-unit rental perfectly balances comfort and convenience, featuring hardwood floors on the main level, an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and an inviting fireplaces. Enjoy serene tree view from the deck accessible from the main and lower levels.  The upper level includes a luxurious primary bedroom with a walk-in closet and vaulted ceilings. The en-suite bathroom is a retreat, featuring a soaking tub, double sink vanity, and walk-in shower. Two additional spacious bedrooms and a hall bath complete the upper level. The lower level provides versatile living with den/office space, a recreation room, walkout to the backyard, full bathroom, and an additional fireplace. Residents will have access to all Kingstowne community amenities, including two outdoor swimming pools, two fitness centers, an aerobics studio, two community centers, six tennis courts, three multi-purpose courts, sand volleyball courts, twenty-five tot lots, and twelve miles of walking trails. Conveniently located near Fort Belvoir, Wegmans, the Beltway, and tons of shopping. Unassigned Parking Spots and On-Street Parking Available. Lease options range from 6 to 18 months, with a $50 application fee per applicant and a maximum of two adults. The security deposit, equal to the first month's rent, is due with the application. Once approved, the tenant has three days to sign the lease, with the security deposit being deposited within the required five-day period. Please note: no smoking, no pets, and a maximum of two adults allowed.  Don’t miss out on making this beautiful 3-level townhome your next home!

AgentRemarks: Apply online through Long & Foster.  $55 per adult. No Pets. Available for Immediate Occupancy! This charming 4 bedroom, split level, single family home in Occoquan offers 2.5 Bathrooms and a One-Car Garage plus driveway with ample parking.  The home is well situated off in a cul-de-sac on 3.21 acres. Mature landscaping - Professionally Maintained at Owner's Expense. Hardwood Floors run throughout the majority of the home. Enter into the home's Foyer and the main level offers a Living Room with built-ins and a Non-Functioning Fireplace. The Living Room leads to the Dining Room which flows right into the Kitchen where you will find ceramic tile floors, a dishwasher, oven and refrigerator as well as a breakfast bar.  The upper level of the home features a Primary Bedroom with an attached Half Bath as well as two spacious Guest Bedrooms and a Full, Hall, Bathroom. On the mid-lower level you will find the fourth Bedroom and the Laundry Room which leads to the second Full Bathroom.  There is also access to the attached, one-car, garage on this level. Continue down to the lowest level of the home where there is a spacious Rec Room that walks-out to the Rear Patio & Yard.  Home offers replacement windows throughout and a 2 year old Heat Pump. You can't beat the location with the close proximity to all that the Historic Town of Occoquan has to offer, including a mix of shops and restaurants. Easy access to major commuter routes to include 95 Express Lanes and the VRE Commuter Rail.

PublicRemarks: This stunning detached home is located in the desirable community of Hartland. This home welcomes you into a spacious foyer leading to a living room/ office on the left with french doors. Guest bedroom 1 with full bathroom on the right.  Sun-filled huge family room with plenty of natural light from all the extra windows, a modern gourmet kitchen that boasts abundant cabinet space, a gas cooktop, a cool backsplash, a chimney, a quartz countertop, SS appliances, a large island, walk in pantry and an expansive breakfast area/sunroom to accommodate your guests. The sunroom  is perfect for your morning coffee.  The master suite is on the main level with coffered ceiling, two good sized walk in closets and zen master bathroom with floating tub, stand in shower with built in bench and dual vanity. The open and modern layout makes living enjoyable. Immaculate hardwood flooring and recessed lighting throughout the main level. The half bath and laundry completes the main level. The garage access is from the main level.  The upper level features a large loft space for entertainment. The two secondary bedrooms are both sizable with access to a full bathroom.  Basement is unfinished, use your imagination and can be a great living space. This home has it all. Pets case-by-case basis, with pet deposit, and pet rent. Note that we do not use the Zillow application, use the Rentspree link from the MLS.   Nestled in Hartland, a highly desired community in Aldie, VA, this home is surrounded by amenities that enrich your life: tennis courts, a cutting-edge fitness center, a lavish pool, parks, trails, and proximity to the delightful scenes of Virginia’s wine country. Close to schools, the airport, shopping, and dining.

PublicRemarks: Move in Ready on Aug 16th.  This is a  3-level townhome is located in a picture-perfect neighborhood of Loudoun Valley Estates II and near the future Silver Line Metro. This Portsmouth model home offers 3 bedrooms and 3.5 bathrooms in over 2,720 sq ft. with 4 feet extension. A bright and inviting two-story foyer welcomes your home.  The main level boasts a highly desirable open floor plan with a formal living room, dining room, family room, modern gourmet kitchen, and eat-in dining area.  The kitchen offers a granite counter with a huge island, stainless steel appliances with an updated backsplash, a full pantry, and custom pendant lighting.  The light-filled dining room provides space for a large dining area and has updated modern light fixtures. The upper level features a huge master suite with soaring vaulted ceilings, two large closets, and a spa-like bath, including a large vanity, dual sinks, stand-up shower, and a soaking tub. The upper level includes laundry. The spacious rec room in the lower level can be used as a den, theater room, home office, or toy room with a full bath and access to the two-car garage. Outside, you will find a large custom Trex deck that backs to the woods and privacy that was built in 2015.   House is updated with a technology package that consists of dual zone Nest thermostats, Smart deadbolt, Ring Doorbell, outdoor camera, and floodlights.  Take advantage of the great Loudoun Valley community features including a Clubhouse, Fitness, Meeting Room, Multiple pools with two playgrounds, basketball courts, and tennis courts directly within the community and throughout. Box Shelf w/lights in the family room, Electric Fireplace, TV mounts, and the technology package to convey. Close to all major routes like 267/Dulles Greenway, Route 28, and Dulles Airport. Call the listing agent for a showing and questions. Pics used are from last year.

PublicRemarks: End of Row 3000+ Square-foot Stanley Martin built Townhouse, 9-foot-high ceiling drenched in natural light. Welcome to a sanctuary with a seamless blend of luxury and practicality. The elegance of the space is matched only by its invitation for indulgent relaxation. It’s a thoughtful touch ensuring that your home is a place of ease and accessibility. Open floor plan; sitting and dining rooms step into a kitchen that’s the heartbeat of your home, with 42" custom cabinets that whisper timeless sophistication, wall tile backsplash, infinite Quartz island that shines with the promise of shared meals and endless conversations. This is a space where functionality meets beauty, a culinary playground equipped with state-of-the-art stainless steel appliances, ready for your favorite recipes and new gastronomic adventures. The outdoor deck is an oasis to enjoy for cookouts.  The primary bedroom suite offers two walk-in closets, and a primary bath, dressed in ceramic tiles offers a spa-like retreat right at home, a place to rejuvenate and prepare for the day's adventures or to unwind as evening falls. 2 Spare hallway rooms; ready to design another bedroom and or home office served by a full bathroom. Clothes washer and dryer on the bedroom level. The recreation room is off the main entrance on the ground level, multi-use: entertaining guests, building your Gym, a pilates studio, or a guest suite with a private full bathroom. 2 car garage + 2 parking spaces on the driveway. Walking distance to parks and trails. Minutes to charming Old Town Manassas restaurants and farmers market. 1.5 miles to Manassas Regional Airport, and 3.1 miles to VRE Station. EZ access to I-66 and major highways. This isn't just a home. It's a promise of life lived well, wrapped in the luxury of convenience and the warmth of community. Welcome to your new home and happy living.

Welcome to this exceptional rental home! This property offers a range of impressive features, including a gourmet kitchen, three living spaces, a beautifully remodeled owner's suite, a versatile walk-out basement, and a private backyard located at the end of a cul de sac. Be sure to check out the walkthrough video for a closer look! As you step inside, you'll be greeted by bright hardwood floors and an inviting entry hallway. The gourmet kitchen is a highlight, featuring quartz countertops, stainless steel appliances, ample cabinetry with convenient pull-out storage, a breakfast bar, and recessed lighting. From the kitchen, you can access the spacious Trex deck, built in 2023, which overlooks the fenced backyard, patio, and well-maintained landscaping. Beyond the fence, you'll find a peaceful backdrop of trees for complete privacy. Just steps out the back gate, you'll find an extensive park with access to the Cross County Trail, as well as amenities such as baseball fields, tennis and volleyball courts. The main level includes a formal dining room, an inviting family room, and a spacious living room with new carpets.  The attached 2-car garage comes equipped with tons of built in storage and a tool bench with peg board.  Upstairs, you'll discover the impressive owner's suite, which underwent a complete remodel in 2021. This suite boasts hardwood floors, two closets including a walk-in closet, and a gorgeous bathroom with dual vanities, an oversized shower, and modern finishes. Additionally, there are two more bedrooms and a full bathroom on the upper level. The lower level of the house offers versatility with a wrap-around rec room, spare room, a full bathroom, , and a convenient laundry room. The walk-out basement provides easy access to a lower patio and also offers additional storage space. This home has been lovingly cared for and offers a total of 3,114 square feet of living space. It is conveniently located close to Mosaic, Inova Fairfax hospital, shopping, restaurants, grocery stores, and the 495 hot lanes. Don't miss out on the opportunity to make this beautiful rental your own. Schedule a viewing today and discover the charm, comfort, and convenient location it has to offer.

The heart of the home is the fully updated kitchen, featuring high-end stainless steel appliances and countertops, custom cabinetry, and a large center island—perfect for both cooking enthusiasts and hosting gatherings. The main level offers an open-concept design with a cozy family room complete with a fireplace and an eat in kitchen creating an inviting atmosphere for all occasions. The primary bedroom has a walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom that includes a soaking tub and a separate shower. All bathrooms throughout the home have been tastefully updated with modern fixtures and high-quality finishes. The additional bedrooms are generously sized, providing ample closet space and flexibility. This home is conveniently situated near top-rated schools, parks, shopping, and dining, with easy access to major commuter routes. Pets on a case by case basis.

ListOfficeName: Bay Property Mgmt Group Northern Virginia, LLC.
AgentRemarks: Please contact Stephanie with Bay Property Management Group at  smerritt@bmgnva.com or call 571-455-5185 with any questions you have about the property.  Please Direct Your Clients To https://baymgmtgroupnorthvirginia.appfolio.com/listings To Pay For And Fill Out The Rental Application. PETSCREENING IS A PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable. Owner will consider 2 pets on a case by case basis. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

This elegant three-level townhouse boasts open-concept living with LVP flooring on the second floor. The gourmet kitchen features upgraded stainless steel appliances and a large center island with a quartz countertop. The spacious living room and dining area provide easy access to the deck. The master bedroom offers a walk-in closet and a spacious master bathroom with a ceramic tile shower. All bedrooms have ceiling fans for added comfort, window treatments also provided in all rooms including living room and dining area.  Additionally, there's a full bathroom on the lower level. Convenience is enhanced by an in-unit washer and dryer, along with high-speed Wi-Fi (***Basic cable service included in rent, tenant will pay for any upgrades. Wireless Access Point installed in home allows multiple wireless devices to be connected to one wired network***). The oversized two-car garage offers ample storage. Located in a prime area, this townhouse is just minutes from the resort-style amenities of Potomac Shores, including a state-of-the-art fitness center, three large pools, an event center, and a greenhouse with garden plots. A short walk in the other direction leads to the Jack Nicklaus-designed golf course and the Tidewater Grill restaurant. Nearby Stonebridge at Potomac Town Center provides shopping, dining, and entertainment options. Enjoy over five miles of walking trails and nature paths, with easy access to I-95 and the VRE coming soon. This home is a must-see and is available now. Sorry, no pets.

PublicRemarks: This gorgeous 2 BD, 1 BA condo is ideally located in Alexandria, Virginia, just off Van Dorn Street at I-495 (minutes from Van Dorn Metro Station and Old Town Alexandria). The community offers an abundance of amenities for its homeowners, such as a dog park, walking trail, tot lot, swimming pool, business center, billiards room, sports court, and fitness center with locker rooms. 2 car garage parking and plenty of visitor parking spaces. 2 parking permits and 1 assigned spot.  New tenants must register with the condominium and receive onboarding orientation prior to the move-in.  There is a one-time non-refundable $300 move-in fee and $500 security deposit (the check is immediately destroyed or returned to tenant after the move-in if no damage occurs at move-in) paid to the condominium association along with the owner's security deposit.   There is a shuttle service to 2 metro stops and it's a 15-minute walk to the Van Dorn Metro Station.

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Pet-Friendly Pet Policy- This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

Excellent school pyramid and fast access to 66 or 495 for commutes in any direction.

This beautifully updated residence with no HOA, nestled on a generous .25-acre lot, seamlessly blends modern comfort with classic charm. Upstairs, you'll find three spacious bedrooms adorned with hardwood floors and an updated full bath, providing a tranquil retreat for family members. The expansive lower level offers even more space, featuring a versatile recreation room, a fourth bedroom or home office, a second full bath, and ample storage. Outside, enjoy the serenity of a large screened-in porch and deck, ideal for unwinding or entertaining, overlooking a beautifully maintained rear yard complete with a convenient shed. Great, Centreville location convenient to shopping, dining, schools, parks, major commuter routes, and Chantilly Golf & Country Club. PublicRemarks: Discover a charming rambler for rent in the desirable Chesterbrook neighborhood. This home sits on a generous 1-acre lot, boasting mature trees and meticulously maintained gardens. A convenient front parking area and entry gate welcome you to the property. A scenic walkway leads to a covered porch, inviting you into the home. Inside, the living room features corner windows and a cozy wood-burning brick fireplace. This space flows seamlessly into the dining area, offering beautiful views of the lush surroundings. The kitchen impresses with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, recessed lighting, and new LVP flooring. Hardwood oak floors grace the main level, which includes a primary bedroom with an ensuite bath, two additional bedrooms, and a full hall bathroom. The lower level houses a spacious recreation room complete with a wood-burning fireplace and walk-out access to a patio overlooking the grand backyard. This floor also features a fourth bedroom, another full bathroom, and a laundry room with space for exercise or additional storage. Located across from the 25-acre Mary Leven Sanctuary Park, this home offers a perfect blend of nature and convenience. Enjoy easy access to GW Parkway, Tysons, and the center of McLean, with just one traffic light between you and Washington, DC. This property truly combines the serenity of spacious living with the advantages of a prime location.

PublicRemarks: 4-Bedroom, 2.5 Bath, 2900+ sq ft home with 2-car garage on a quiet street in the Kingstream neighborhood of Herndon. This home features 4 large bedrooms with ceiling fans and two full bathrooms on the 2nd floor, the master has a walk-in closet. The main floor has two living areas (the longer one has a gas fireplace and space for a kitchen table), kitchen with breakfast bar, an office or formal dining room, and a half bath, as well as an enclosed well-lit sun-room. The finished portion of the basement includes a newly-carpeted spacious recreation area and bonus room (that can be used as an office or guest room/5th bedroom). The basement also features a large laundry/storage room, a room with a built-in workbench, and another room that can be used for storage or gym area. The nicely landscaped and fenced backyard includes a stone patio, deck off the sun-room, café string lighting, shed, mature trees, and there is always something in bloom. There is a raised-bed vegetable garden on the side of the house that gets plenty of sunshine. The house has a ton of storage space in the upstairs closets, basement, attic, and in the built-in furniture on the main floor. In the school boundary for Dranesville Elementary, Herndon MS, and Herndon HS, also close to great preschools. Super closer to Herndon High School and Sugarland Run trail network. Pets case-by-base (Small dogs, no cats). All TAG Home Management residents are required to be enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP)

PublicRemarks: Location!! Like-New!! Convenience!! Discover the highly sought-after Metro Walk luxury townhome-style condominium at Moorefield Station, just steps away from the Silver Line Metro Station. This nearly new, meticulously maintained 2-level home spans 1,626 square feet and offers the perfect blend of modern design and convenience. The main level features luxury plank flooring throughout, enhancing the open-concept living space. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, with an expansive island, frost-white quartz countertops, and stainless steel appliances, including a gas range, built-in microwave, dishwasher, and pendant lighting. White cabinets provide a sleek, clean look, and the pantry offers additional storage. The large, cozy living area is bathed in natural light, thanks to oversized windows with 2” faux wood blinds. Enjoy stunning views of the community pond with its serene fountains. Upstairs, the primary bedroom offers a peaceful retreat with a walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom. The bathroom features a seamless glass shower with a bench, floor-to-ceiling tile, a linen closet, and double vanity sinks. Two additional well-sized bedrooms share a hall bath with a tub and vanity sink, all complemented by plush carpeting. The convenience continues with a walk-in laundry room equipped with a GE washer and dryer. This home also includes a single-car garage, and water and trash are covered in the rent. As a resident, you'll have access to the brand-new resort-style amenities, including a clubhouse, gym, pool, tot lot, and recreation area, all located near the Metro. Live in a vibrant, newly developed community with easy access to the Silver Line Metro, community parks, walking and biking trails, and just 7 miles from Dulles International Airport. Quick access to the Dulles Greenway, major highways, toll roads, and Loudoun County transit bus stations makes commuting a breeze. Plus, future retail development at Loudoun Station and Moorefield Station will bring even more convenience to your doorstep. No Pets. No Smoking. Please use the Rentspree link in MLS to apply.
