PublicRemarks: Welcome to the vibrant Dominion Valley community, where luxury living meets an active lifestyle. This master-planned community by Toll Brothers offers a wealth of amenities, including markets, restaurants, barbers, bars, tennis and basketball courts, indoor and outdoor pools, and miles of scenic walking trails. Nestled on a tranquil street with a backdrop of a championship golf course, this home is a sanctuary of comfort and style. As you enter, you're greeted by an open-concept layout with soaring ceilings and elegant bamboo flooring throughout. The expansive entryway sets the tone for the inviting spaces that follow. The heart of the home is the gourmet kitchen, which seamlessly flows into a sunlit family room and sunroom,  which offer access to a deck with serene views of trees and the golf course. Imagine relaxing in this peaceful setting, where indoor and outdoor living blend effortlessly. On the main floor, you'll find formal living and dining areas, an office space, a convenient laundry room, and a stylish powder room. Upstairs, the spacious master suite is a private retreat, featuring his-and-hers closets and a beautifully updated bathroom with a floating tub and a spa-like shower. Three additional bedrooms share two updated bathrooms, providing ample closet space and comfort for family and guests. The fully finished basement is designed for entertainment and relaxation, with engineered hardwood floors, mounted TVs, comfortable seating, and a dining area. An exercise room (equipment not included) and a wet bar with a mini fridge and sink complete the lower level. Outdoor living is a delight with the composite deck flooring and a natural gas hookup for your BBQ. Just bring your furniture and start enjoying the serene surroundings. The home features a two car garage with ample space to store your tools.  In addition there is builtin in 240V EV charging for Tesla.  This home also includes  stainless steel appliances including washer/drier.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this gorgeous Toll Brothers carriage home that feels like a single-family home but has the maintenance-free lifestyle of a townhouse. The home is NorthEast facing, comes with a loft, painted walls, many customized shelving , large built in desks,storage and Den. This meticulously maintained home has total 4,460 sqft. Main level has open plan with spacious living & dining room with Bay Window. The rear of the house opens to a gourmet modern kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and large island which flows into a spacious family room with gas fireplace. A cosy deck off the kitchen provides a convenient & leisure outdoor space. The mudroom has storage bench and space for additional refrigerator off the kitchen which leads to a two-car garage in the back. This home’s garage has multiple large ceiling storage racks. NO CODES will be given via text, email or phone call. $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant(s) agree to be enrolled and to pay the applicable monthly TOTAL cost of $45.95 per household. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.
PublicRemarks: Outstanding "just like new" 2022 home! Main level with hardwood flooring. Gourmet Kitchen features stainless steel appliances, beautiful cabinetry, and loads of counter space allowing you to try out all your new recipes! Separate dining room with table space. Super convenient to I-95, Quantico base, shopping and dining!

The kitchen is a chef's paradise, featuring stainless steel appliances, gas cooking, huge granite island with breakfast bar and backsplash. The expansive great room with gleaming hardwood floors is open to the kitchen & dining area and leads to the flex area with elegant marble flooring, perfect as an office or library. On the upper level you'll find three generously sized bedrooms, ensuring plenty of space for rest and relaxation. The owner's suite includes a large walk-in closet and spa -like bathroom. Take a leisurely stroll to nearby shops and restaurants, enjoying all the amenities right at your doorstep. With its modern features, spacious layout, and unbeatable location, this home combines style and functionality for everyday enjoyment. Experience the perfect blend of luxury and convenience! PublicRemarks: Welcome to 9420 Packard Way in beautiful Burke, VA—a delightful, fully renovated home offering a perfect blend of modern amenities and cozy comfort! This charming 3-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom residence has been thoughtfully renovated throughout as of 2024, featuring a brand-new kitchen, updated bathrooms, and stunning new flooring throughout. Enjoy the convenience of in-home laundry and the comfort of a completely refreshed interior, ready for you to move right in. Step outside to discover your own private oasis! The new hardscape patio is perfect for entertaining or enjoying a quiet morning coffee, surrounded by the serene beauty of your backyard. This outdoor space is ideal for hosting gatherings, barbecues, or simply relaxing with a good book. Located in a friendly neighborhood, 9420 Packard Way is just moments away from some of Burke's best parks, including Burke Lake Park and Lake Braddock Park, offering plenty of green space for outdoor activities, jogging, or a leisurely picnic. You’ll love the convenience of nearby shopping centers, where you can find everything from grocery stores to charming boutiques and local eateries. With easy access to commuter routes and public transportation, getting around is a breeze. This home is not just a place to live, but a place to love. Make 9420 Packard Way your new haven today!

AgentRemarks: No pets.  No smoking.  Landlord prefers an 18 mo. to 2 yr.  lease but will accept a 1 year lease.  See Documents.  Impressive 3 BR 2.5 BA townhouse in a private enclave.  Many upgrades throughout make this a perfect home.  Newly installed energy efficient windows throughout. Gleaming hardwood floors on main level.  Brand new luxury vinyl plank floors on the bedroom level.  Huge kitchen, with stainless steel appliances, a peninsula breakfast bar and area for either a family or breakfast room.  There is a large deck off the kitchen.  Upgrades include fresh paint, light fixtures and fan lights throughout, in the kitchen there are granite counter tops, tile back splash, large stainless sink, exhaust fan.  The primary  bath has granite counter tops, dual porcelain sinks, soaking tub and separate shower.  The primary bedroom comes with a vaulted ceiling and walk-in-closet.   A family room with a gas fireplace and newly installed carpet is on the lower level.  There is parking for 2 cars (1 in the garage and 1 in the driveway).  The garage has a full wall of shelves for plenty of storage.  Guest parking is available.  There is a convenient jogging path.  Near shopping, dining, buses, Huntington Metro, Old Town Alexandria, Ft. Belvoir, Bolling AFB, Pentagon and Alexandria Mark Center.

AgentRemarks: Fabulous end unit townhouse style condo.  Walkability plus!. Landsdowne Town Centre. Just refurbished, fresh Paint, beautiful hardwood floors throughout. Garage, All new lighting and more!
PublicRemarks: Fabulous end-unit, lower level condo located in sought-after Landsdowne Town Center. Great open floor plan with 3 bedrooms and 2.5 baths. New hardwood floors throughout, new lighting, freshly painted throughout. Main level boasts a separate living room, dining space (with an added floor-to-ceiling bay windows for extra sunlight) and a spacious kitchen with lovely cabinetry and granite countertops. Upper level features three bedrooms and laundry, for added convenience. Primary Suite includes a private balcony and two walk-in closets. Primary Bath Suite features a separate tub, large shower, double vanity and separate toilet room. Unit has an oversized one-car garage and a custom-built under the stair storage space (approximately 7 ft length x 8 ft width). Close to restaurants and shopping, Lansdowne enjoys a central square with an in-ground water fountain for the kids, grass to play, and stage for outdoor concerts. There are also designated dog walk areas, a pond, gazebo, and a nearby golf course. Monthly rent includes Water, Trash & Snow Removal, Outdoor Pool, Fitness Center, Playground & Tot Lot, Party Room & Club House, Exterior Building Maintenance, Lawn Care and Common Grounds

PublicRemarks: Discover this beautifully updated 3,200 sqft home nestled in the sought-after Williamsburg neighborhood of Arlington. The spacious and light-filled living areas provide a warm and welcoming atmosphere throughout. The bright kitchen, complete with a cozy breakfast nook, seamlessly flows into a sunny, separate dining room, perfect for entertaining. Step outside to the fenced-in patio, ideal for enjoying a quiet morning or a cup of coffee. Upstairs, the home boasts four generously-sized bedrooms and two full baths, including an updated primary ensuite designed for comfort and relaxation. Parking is a breeze with plenty of space available in the backyard. The location is unbeatable, with close proximity to top-rated schools like Nottingham Elementary, Williamsburg Middle, Yorktown High, and Bishop O’Connell High. Commute effortlessly with the East Falls Church Metro, I-66 entrance just a mile away, and easy access to Metro bus and the Custis Trail for biking, jogging, or walking. Enjoy the convenience of nearby parks, pools (Overlee, Yorktown indoor, and Columbus), as well as pharmacies, grocery stores, shopping, and an array of wonderful restaurants.

See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.
PublicRemarks: Nestled on 3 sprawling acres, this exquisite home boasts 4 spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, and an impressive 5,000 square feet of meticulously finished living space. Step into the grand two-story foyer, where elegant laminate flooring flows seamlessly through the formal dining room, formal living room, cozy library/den, and into a vast family room adorned with a striking masonry fireplace and a wood pellet stove. The open-concept design invites you into a chef’s dream kitchen, complete with granite countertops, rich cherry cabinetry, stainless steel appliances, and an inviting sunroom. Abundant natural light pours in through expansive windows and skylights, while French doors from the sunroom lead you to a TREX deck overlooking the serene grounds. A newly added pantry with a prep kitchen adds both convenience and style. Ascend one of two staircases to the upper level, where the luxurious primary suite awaits. This retreat features a generous sitting area, an additional closet, and a spa-inspired bathroom with a soaking tub, oversized walk-in shower, dual vanities, and his-and-hers walk-in closets. Three more spacious bedrooms, each with its own walk-in closet, and a well-appointed full bath complete the second floor. The partially finished basement offers a full bath and walkout access to a stone patio, perfect for relaxing in the hot tub. Ideally located, this home is just a short drive from shopping, dining, I-95, historic landmarks, and county parks, making it a perfect blend of luxury and convenience.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to the peaceful and picturesque community of Bridleridge nestled in Vienna. This beautiful neighborhood, in the coveted Flint Hill ES, Thoreau MS and Madison HS Triangle, is one of the area’s best kept secrets. This 3 level, 6 bedroom, 3.5 bath colonial with a front porch sits on over .5 acres and is the perfect oasis to call home. The home boasts a main floor mother-in-law / au pair suite and new sunroom addition both of which overlook the backyard oasis. The property is an entertainer's delight featuring a pool, hot tub, gazebo, outdoor bar with refrigerator and microwave, basketball court, putting green and lovely landscaping throughout the yard as well as a large freshly sealed driveway and front porch. The interior of the home features a welcoming foyer, bright eat-in kitchen, dining room, living room with new (2023) gas fireplace and a first floor office right off the main foyer and the garage entryway, which can serve as a mudroom. The main floor also includes a new full bath and the laundry room off of the kitchen. The upper level features a spacious primary bedroom with en suite full bathroom as well as four additional bedrooms and a full bathroom. As you make your way to the basement, you'll enjoy a large recreational room with another new (2023) gas fireplace as well as an exercise or other purpose room in addition to storage. This special home also has direct access to the W&OD trail that takes you right into the Town of Vienna for the annual Halloween Parade, Holiday Stroll, Summer Concerts and much more. Other updates include: completely new heating system (2024), main AC (2024), pool pump (2023), roof (2022), family room addition + windows (2021), new windows through rest of the home (2019-2020), in-law / au pair suite including full bath conversion on main level (2019), and so much more! Minutes from Maple Ave, highways, and the Tyson's corridor!

AgentRemarks: Beautiful, upgraded 3-level Townhome in sought-after Lowes Island, Cascades. This house is move-in ready with four bedrooms and 3.5 baths and many upgrades. As you are welcomed home, you will notice the gleaming Hardwood floors on the main level and the freshly painted walls throughout the house.  A huge upgrade has just been made to the kitchen. Brand new all LG appliances to be delivered on September 12. Owner just installed Quartz countertops, a breakfast bar,  and a new sink.  The living and dining combo opens up to the family room, which is part of eat-in kitchen. A newly installed curtain to block the sun-drenched kitchen.  All cabinetry was professionally cleaned and ready for your move. Large deck for your entertainment that overlooks greenery for your privacy and overlooks the two-mile trail just out of your basement door.   You have three spacious bedrooms on the upper level, and freshly painted and professionally cleaned carpets. The master bedroom has its master bath with a whirlpool and a window that brings extra light, a new faucet, and a new light fixture. Its walk-in closet comes with some shelving for your convenience. As you exit the master bedroom to the vaulted ceiling hallway and a skylight, you come across the two other bedrooms. Both have large windows, and shades and the shared bathroom has a new faucet and new light fixtures as well. From the main level, you take the stairs to a spacious and private basement that features a full bedroom that has a large window, and an extra storage space under the stairs. Its full bathroom is upgraded with new lights and a new faucet, ideal for an au pair, guest room, or simply put to your use. Cozy up during the winder over the gas fireplace with windows to watch and a brand-new sliding door to the brick patio that opens up to the trail just outside your basement door. This trail is about a two-mile stretch that starts at Whitewater Dr., all the way to Lowes Island Ave on the other side of the community.  Other interior features include high ceilings, good closet sizes, and a laundry room in the basement with extra storage. Enjoy the Cascades Community for Pools, Tennis Court, and Fitness Center. It is a great location for professionals, and working families, with great schools and parks. Choose the robust outdoor adventure at Algonkian Regional Park from swimming, golf, fishing, waterparks, or just strolling.

With six spacious bedrooms and 4.5 modern bathrooms, this stunning property boasts 3,116 square feet of living space. The home has been fully permitted as a brand-new build in 2022, with brand new windows, bathrooms, and a kitchen that has been renovated to perfection. The open-concept kitchen is a highlight of the home, featuring a quartz countertop, large island with waterfall seating area, LVP plank flooring, solid wood tread stair casing, modern cabinets, SMART appliances, an induction oven, and LED lighting. The home also features distinctive woodwork, custom cabinetry, and modern paint finishes throughout. The elegant dining room and library are adorned with modern and elegant finishes, and the spacious primary bedroom includes a walk-in closet and large in-suite bathroom with a huge shower and free-standing tub. With four additional bedrooms on the second floor, as well as three additional bathrooms, you'll never have to worry about not having enough room for guests. A washer and dryer on the second floor add convenience to the home, and the panoramic balcony in the main master bedroom offers stunning views. A rare find in the neighborhood, this home also features a bedroom on the first floor with a walk-in closet and full bathroom. Whether you're grilling on the upper deck or relaxing in the lush green backyard, the ambiance is perfect. And with its convenient location just eight miles from DC and Arlington, this home has it all. The landscaping was recently seeded, and driveway finished just two months ago, and the attached garage features a Tesla residential CHARGER wall connector outlet. Don't miss out on this incredible opportunity to own a piece of history!

One of Travel + Leisure's "Best Cities in the U.S. 2023", Alexandria offers the charm of a small town, Old Town's historic allure, and Del Ray's electric vibe, alongside the buzz of the Nation's capital. With limited inventory and high demand, securing a slice of this coveted neighborhood requires swift action and a strong plan. Split Level SFH on a corner lot in a sought-after community. Newly renovated 5 bedrooms and 3.5 bath with living area of 1902 sf. An open floor plan with modern eat-in kitchen offers new quartz countertops, new cabinets and floors. Living Room and dining room open with a sliding door out to a large deck and a serene gazebo, perfect for relaxation and outdoor entertaining! Recently renovated primary bedroom with walk in closet and ensuite bathroom featuring new floor, vanity and shower. Newly finished hallway bath. Hardwood floor and new luxury vinyl plank flooring. The newly finished walk-out basement offers a spacious recreation room with a fireplace, one full bath and bedroom, and laundry room. Fresh interior and exterior painting. Oversized 2 car garage (New Garage doors) with exit to backyard. A large and wide driveway offers plenty of parking spaces. Spacious Lot 0.36 acre, with fully fenced back yard. With proximity to major highways, several Metro stations & bus routes just minutes from home, it is a commuter's dream location. One year of lease at minimum. One month rent as deposit. Renters are responsible for all utilities. No pets. No smoking inside the house.

PublicRemarks:
Incredible townhome in the coveted Moorefield Station community, just minutes to the Silver Line metro stop in Ashburn. This unit is filled with natural light that pours in throughout all three levels. A like-new low maintenance home in a walkable community with sidewalks throughout, and the landscaping is maintained by the association. There are four bedrooms and three-and-one-half bathrooms on three finished levels, as well as a rear-loading two car garage and private driveway. In Moorefield Station, living is easy!

You can enter the home from the ground level through either the front, light-filled foyer, or the garage in the back. There is a bedroom and a full bathroom on this level which makes for a perfect space for guests, a home office, or gym! The home has been freshly painted in modern tones throughout and features wide plank hardwood floors and upgraded crown molding.

The thoughtfully designed main level features an open layout while still accommodating distinctive space for living and dining rooms. The upgraded kitchen boasts expansive granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and an oversized center island, as well as a spacious breakfast room with access to the composite deck with a privacy screening.

Three additional bedrooms are on the third floor along with a conveniently located washer and dryer. The primary suite is expansive with a soaring vaulted ceiling, hardwood flooring, a modern ceiling fan, a walk-in closet, and an attached upgraded bathroom with a dual vanity and glass shower. The secondary bedrooms are a nice size as well. The entire home features new carpet and fresh paint throughout.

Moorefield Station is an amenity rich community with a fully equipped gym, a clubhouse with regularly scheduled activities, a swimming pool, playgrounds, sidewalks, parks and trails. Highly sought-after Loudoun County schools and within minutes of restaurants, shops, entertainment and many commuter options!

The upper level has hardwood floors throughout and includes a spacious sun-filled living room, half bath, large dining room, and luxury eat-in kitchen with breakfast bar and granite countertops. 3rd floor has 2 generous bedrooms, and a full bath as well as the impressive master bedroom which includes a large walk-in closet and master bath featuring double vanity, soaking tub and separate standing shower. The lower level also features garage access where you'll have a large 2-car garage and 2-car driveway. The home is well maintained. The home is located near a Park and Ride lot and a Soccer Field. Community amenities include a pool, clubhouse, playgrounds, and walking trails. East Gate Community is located close to shopping, dining, and everyday needs at East Gate Marketplace, Dulles Landing, and South Riding Market Square. East Gate Marketplace has Harris Teeter, Dulles Landing has a Walmart Supermart, and South Riding Market Square has Home Depot. It’s also close to Chantilly Crossing Lane where Costco, Target, Office Depot, and other stores are located. Also close to Lotte Supermarket and Lowes. Quick access to Route 50, I-66, Loudoun County Parkway (Rt 606), Route 28, AND VA-267 for an easy commute to Reston, Tysons, Arlington, and Washington DC. Stone Springs Hospital is just few minutes away. Pleasant Valley Golf Club and South Riding Golf Club are right around the corner - less than 2 miles. Wineries and breweries along Route 50 and 15 corridors - within 25 minutes. Just 15 minutes to Dulles International Airport. If you're ready for your next townhome in an amenity-filled community this location can't be beat.

PublicRemarks: Charming 2-Bedroom Condo in Active Cardinal Forest Community Welcome to Cardinal Forest, a vibrant community with a small-town feel, conveniently located near everything you need. This recently remodeled 2-bedroom, 1-bath condo on the first floor features a private patio and a lovely flower garden, ideal for relaxing or gardening. The galley kitchen boasts stainless steel appliances, and the home features modern laminate flooring throughout — no carpet! Plus, enjoy the convenience of an in-unit washer and dryer. Located in the heart of Cardinal Forest, this condo offers easy access to top-rated Fairfax County Public Schools, all within 1 to 1.5 miles of your doorstep. Community amenities include two pools, playgrounds, eight tennis courts, a clubhouse for rent, ample parking, and frequent neighborhood events that foster a strong sense of community. Trader Joe’s and Giant Groceries are both less than 2 miles away, providing ultimate convenience. Gas hot water and heating are included in rent, and the unit stays comfortably cool (below 72 degrees) throughout the summer without air conditioning, making it an energy-efficient and cost-effective living space. Commuting is a breeze with multiple options, including bus routes through the community and a nearby VRE train station. This condo is available for immediate move-in! Don’t miss out on the chance to join this welcoming community! Contact us today to schedule a viewing. Professional photos coming soon.

PublicRemarks: Stunning New Build in Premier Community Be the first to experience luxury living in this brand-new, modern home, showcasing a striking brick front, rooftop terrace, and a rear deck. This expansive residence features four spacious bedrooms, four full baths, and one half bath, all accentuated by soaring nine-foot ceilings that add a grand feel throughout. Equipped with dual-zone heating and cooling, this home ensures comfort in every season. The heart of the home is the gourmet chef’s kitchen, boasting upgraded luxury quartz countertops, a large island, and top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances. Premium fixtures and luxury vinyl plank flooring further elevate the space. The ground level offers convenient access, including a versatile office or bedroom, a half bath, and a two-car garage. The second floor is designed for entertainment and relaxation, featuring a spacious dining room, an expansive living room with an optional extension and deck access, and a well-appointed designer kitchen with an oversized island. A powder room is also included on this level for convenience. The third level houses two generously sized bedrooms, each with its own attached bathroom. The primary suite stands out with a luxury spa bath complete with ceramic tiles and a dual vanity. The fourth level adds another bedroom, a full bath, a spacious loft, and a stunning rooftop terrace. This home is ideally located within walking distance of Brambleton Town Center, offering restaurants, a movie theater, a library, and shops. It’s also close to golf courses, wineries, walking trails, farmers markets, and more, making it a perfect blend of modern living and convenience.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this beautifully updated townhouse, ideally situated directly across from George Mason University. Enjoy new paint and carpet throughout the home, enhancing its bright and inviting atmosphere. This home offers a blend of contemporary style and functional living, perfect for anyone seeking convenience and comfort.  The main floor includes a convenient half bath, ideal for guests and everyday use. The updated kitchen features refreshed cabinets, a new Quartz countertops, and all-new stainless steel appliances, combining modern aesthetics with practicality. The second floor features 3 generously-sized bedrooms and 2 full baths. The master suite is a highlight, boasting an updated shower with new tiles for a fresh and modern touch. The lower level provides a large recreation room with a walkout to a fenced-in yard, perfect for outdoor relaxation and activities. Additionally, you'll find a half bath, a laundry room with a washer and dryer, and two storage rooms to meet all your organizational needs. This townhouse includes two assigned parking spots and one visitor parking permit for added convenience. Take advantage of the community’s outdoor swimming pool, perfect for enjoying sunny days and relaxing. Located across from George Mason University, this townhouse offers unparalleled access to campus amenities and a vibrant community atmosphere. Don’t miss your chance to live in this fantastic townhouse with all the modern updates and amenities you could desire.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this chic updated townhome in the Windy Hill Community of Alexandria. You'll love this 4-level, 3 bed, 2.5 bath with loft, garage, and two outdoor spaces. This property is inside the Beltway, with great access to major roads and only .5mi from the bus.  This home is modern, updated and in beautiful condition! This home is made for entertaining with an open floor plan on the main level that's perfect for parties that spill out onto a fabulous deck! It has a gourmet Kitchen has granite counters with 42 inch wood cabinets, LG stainless appliances, large island and breakfast nook.  There's also a half-bath on the main. The main bedroom suite is on its own floor with double closets and huge en-suite spa-like bath. The top floor features a bedroom and loft, also with its own bathroom, so the home feels like it actually has two main suites. The loft is a wonderful flex space for home office, reading, yoga, art studio or whatever you want. The lower level features a garage and separate bedroom space with a closet, laundry, gas fireplace and access to the lovely fenced yard and patio. This community is close to major commuter routes of I-395 and I-495, as well as Metro Bus express routes to the Pentagon, avails to the Blue & Yellow Lines of the Metro Transit Line; and is 7 miles to Washington DC, 8 miles to Mount Vernon, 9 miles to the Pentagon & Crystal City, 10 miles to Reagan National Airport, and 17 miles to Fort Belvoir. The property is very convenient to schools, shopping, and restaurants, including Springfield Town Center, as well as Old Town Alexandria. You'll love it here! Updates and Upgrades to the home include: NEW Water Heater in 2021, NEW Microwave/Convection  Oven and Air Fryer - 2021, Samsung Washer and Dryer (WiFi Enabled) TV Painted Cabinets and New Backsplash in Kitchen 2021, Millwork with custom paint and wallpaper in various rooms of the home 2021. Mount in the Living Rm and Drapes and Blinds Convey. Ask you agent for the link to apply!

The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is voluntary and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants who do not upload their own renters' insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days before move-in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters' insurance program. More details upon application.

PublicRemarks: Welcome Home! Nestled in the serene cul-de-sac of Arbor Glen, this charming split-foyer offers a blend of comfort and style. Boasting 3 spacious bedrooms, 3 full baths, and an attached garage with extra workspace, this home is perfect for modern living. The main level greets you with new laminate wood floors, a bright and airy ambiance, and a kitchen featuring stainless steel appliances and a convenient island that flows into the formal dining and living room. Step out from the dining room onto a private deck overlooking mature trees—ideal for barbecues or enjoying a morning coffee. The primary bedroom, positioned at the back for extra privacy, features a ceiling fan, dual closets, and an ensuite bath. Downstairs, a generous family/game room with sliding doors to the side exterior awaits, along with a full bath, utility/laundry room, and garage access. Conveniently located near the Marine Corps base, shops, restaurants, and with quick interstate access, this home combines tranquility and convenience. Don’t miss your chance to make it yours!

On the main level, you'll find 2 bright and airy bedrooms and a full bath, complemented by a light-filled living room that offers a welcoming atmosphere. The formal dining room, conveniently located next to the living area, is ideal for hosting family meals and gatherings. The upper level features 2 additional bedrooms, a large walk-in closet, and another full bath, providing ample space and privacy for family members or guests. The lower level is a true gem, offering a separate living area with a bedroom, full bath, living room, dining room, and a kitchenette—perfect for multi-generational living or as an in-law suite. For added convenience, a washer and dryer are also located on this level. Outside, the large fenced-in yard provides plenty of space for parking multiple cars and enjoying outdoor activities.  Located near Rt 1, this home offers easy access to I-495, the GW Parkway, and the Huntington Metro station. You'll also appreciate the proximity to bus transportation, shops, and a variety of restaurants, making this a highly convenient and desirable location. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this versatile home your own. Schedule a visit today to experience all that it has to offer! The Lease is subject to the Richmond Highway Expansion Project. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.  -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old.  Case by Case There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

Offering over 4,400 square feet of refined living space, 4 bedrooms, 4.5 bathrooms, a 2-car garage, a walk-out lower level, and an expansive composite deck, all sited on a stunningly landscaped 1/3-acre lot. As you step inside, you're greeted by a grand two-story foyer. The bright living room, complete with a cozy fireplace, is perfect for relaxing. There is also a spacious dining room, ideal for hosting formal dinners. The gourmet kitchen, the heart of the home, features plenty of cabinets and counter space, a large center island, and high-end stainless steel appliances. The main level also includes a study with built-ins, a sunroom with vaulted ceilings and triple atrium doors to the deck, and a laundry/mudroom with a utility sink and Kenmore Elite washer and dryer. Upstairs, the luxurious owner's suite features a vaulted ceiling, a walk-in closet, a sitting room with a fireplace, and a remodeled ensuite bathroom with heated tile floors, a freestanding tub, an oversized shower, a dual vanity, and skylights. Two additional bedrooms share a renovated hall bathroom, and there is another bedroom with a private ensuite bath. The walkout basement offers a spacious recreation room with a wet bar, a fourth fireplace, a full bathroom, and tons of storage. Outside, the expansive composite deck overlooks a beautifully landscaped, fenced backyard with a 9-zone irrigation system and a variety of mature trees and shrubs. Located in the sought-after Virginia Run community, this home provides access to amenities like basketball courts, tennis and pickleball courts, tot lots, a pool, and miles of trails, with convenient access to commuter routes, shopping, dining, and parks. This property is the perfect blend of luxury and convenience!

PublicRemarks: STUNNING! Large and nearly new Potomac Shores luxury townhouse is available for rent with end of October/ beginning of November move in!  This beautiful home has 2300 sq ft of living space on 4 levels with 4 bedrooms and 2.5 bathrooms and a two car garage.  It has an amazing location in the sought after community of Potomac Shores.  This 4 level townhome features a gorgeous gourmet kitchen any cook will fall in love with! Other great features are a balcony off of the main living area and a sun deck patio on the 4th level. The entry level has a nice covered front porch, and the front door opens into a bonus room/rec room/flex space.  To the rear on the entry level is a door that opens into the two car garage, and a large storage closet.  This house has loads of storage space and closets in the garage, and on all levels!  There is a beautiful hardwood staircase leading up to the show stopping main level.  The main living area is open concept with a living room, kitchen, and dining area. The Gourmet kitchen has a huge island for cooking and entertaining, stainless steel appliances, a wall oven, built in microwave, refrigerator, gas six burner cook top, tons of cabinetry, quartz counter tops, and a large pantry.  This floor offers a half bath and a office nook off of the dining room.  Upstairs the third floor has the primary bedroom suite, the laundry room, and  two secondary bedrooms with a shared hall bathroom. The primary bedroom has a large walk-in closet,  the luxury bath has a soaking tub, large shower, and double sink vanities with upgraded tile and cabinetry.  Both bathrooms have upgraded tile and finishes.  The laundry hook up is on this bedroom level.  Upstairs to the 4th floor is a bonus room or 4th bedroom that has the access to the outdoor patio sundeck.  The community has plenty of open street parking. The home is available for rent at the end of October or beginning of November. The rent includes the HOA fee and the use of the amazing amenities that Potomac Shores has to offer!  The rent includes internet, trash removal, snow removal, outdoor pools, clubhouse, gym, indoor pool, playgrounds, sports fields, waterfront dock, trails, and golf memberships are available separately.  Just a short distance from your front door is  the soon-to-be-built VRE train station that will let you catch the train to work for a stress-free direct connection to Alexandria and Washington, DC.  Landlord requires the following; no smoking, no pets, income to be at least three times the monthly rent and credit scores of 620 or higher per applicant.  Every adult 18 years and older must complete an application if they will be living in the home.  Please apply via rent spree application link.  There will be credit check, criminal background check,  job verification and rental history check as well as proof of income, assets, and debts.  The home is owner occupied and all showing appointments need to be approved prior to taking entry to the home.  Owner works from home and needs a minimum of 2 hours notice for showings.  Please contact listing agent for showings or schedule online and wait for approval.  Owner prefers a 3 year lease or a 1-2 year lease with the option to renew.

Unique features include the Sky Lanai off the dining room, which consists of an exterior stone gas fireplace.  Two guest bedrooms on the 3rd floor share a full bath easily accessible from the hallway, and the Owner’s bedroom offers a calm retreat with a spa shower.  The 4th floor offers an open loft with a full bath and balcony. Carlin Place is located just steps from parks, shopping, dining, public transportation, and more, truly making it a community of convenience.

AgentRemarks: For quickest response text agent – 571-248-9460 To apply please visit our website - https://www.managementpros.com/rental-application/ More information in the document section of the MLS. Please be sure you are using the correct combo box for entry -full details on showing instructions are sent after a showing has been confirmed through the MLS. NO CODES will be given via text, email or phone call. $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant(s) agree to be enrolled and to pay the applicable monthly TOTAL cost of $45.95 per household. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Extremely rare 4-level Clarendon—over 1,800 sq feet in total—renovated top to bottom and move-in ready! Missed the summer rental market? Then this one’s for you! Gorgeous hardwood floors and bright recessed lighting welcome you on the main level. The gourmet “eat-in” combination kitchen/dining room features large center island, stone countertops, subway tile backsplash, sleek black appliances, and custom built-in storage benches. Head upstairs to find two comfortable bedrooms plus a beautifully renovated full bathroom. A second set of stairs will take you to the top floor—an expansive primary bedroom with vaulted ceilings, rustic exposed beams, generous closet and unfinished storage space. The lower level features a large rec room with custom built-ins and window seats. Through the rec room, you will find a versatile bonus room, second full bath, and in-unit laundry. Directly off the kitchen, you will find a fully fenced backyard with inviting flagstone patio. From the back gate, you have direct access to the playground. Unit comes with one assigned parking space (316). Amenities galore! Tot lots, tennis courts, basketball courts, outdoor swimming pool. Incredible location: Approximately 2.4 miles to Metro with direct express bus service steps outside front door. Close proximity to Shirlington Village and Bradlee Shopping Center. Direct access to I-395. Easy access to bike path that connects to Four Mile Run and WO&D trail. Dog friendly property!! Owners will allow up to 2 dogs with refundable pet deposit ($500 per dog). This one won’t last!  Non-refundable app fee of $55 per person. All residents over 18 must apply. Minimum income 40 times rent. Good credit required. No more than 2 incomes to qualify. PublicRemarks: Welcome to your new home at Potomac Falls! This spacious and well-maintained 3 bedroom, 2.5 bathroom townhouse with garage offers 1,916 square feet of comfortable living space in the sought after Potomac Lakes. Enjoy a bright and airy floor plan with ample natural light, perfect for entertaining and everyday living. An open foyer welcomes you home as gleaming hardwood flooring ushers you into the spacious living room where twin windows fill the space with natural light illuminating warm neutral paint and crisp crown molding. The open kitchen is equipped with striking granite countertops, updated stainless steel appliances, generous cabinet space, and a convenient breakfast area. The adjoining dining room is ideal for all occasions and has a French style door granting access to the large custom deck, perfect for indoor and outdoor dining and entertaining. A powder room rounds out the main level. Relax in the large primary bedroom suite boasting a wall of windows, walking in closet, and an ensuite bath with dual sink vanity, soaking tub and separate shower. Two additional spacious bedrooms provide flexibility for family, guests, or a home office and share access to the well-appointed hall bath. The walk-out lower level family room has plenty of space for games, media and opens to a private covered patio area and tranquil landscaped private backyard backing to trees, ideal for simple relaxation. All this in a lovely community with amenities such as an outdoor pool, sports courts, jog/walking paths, playground and more. Everyone will enjoy the close proximity to shopping centers, restaurants, parks, and excellent schools. Easy access to major highways makes commuting a breeze. Don't miss the opportunity to make this lovely townhome your own! Schedule a viewing today and experience all that this wonderful property has to offer. We look forward to welcoming you to your new home!

PublicRemarks: Welcome home to this stunning brick rambler with a walk-out lower level, offering 4 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the main floor. You'll love the generously sized rooms and beautiful hardwood floors throughout. The hall bath features double sinks for added convenience. Cozy up by the wood-burning fireplace in the living room or enjoy meals in the eat-in kitchen, which boasts new stainless steel (2024) dishwasher, cooktop, and wall oven. Separate dining area with sliding glass doors onto the deck -- take in the gorgeous views!  Downstairs, the high ceilings and abundant natural light from the sliding doors create an inviting space perfect for entertaining. Another wood-burning fireplace enhances the ambiance of this lower level, which includes a full bath, a bedroom, a bonus room, a laundry/mud room with new (2024) washer and dryer and a large utility room with ample storage. The expansive backyard is ideal for relaxing and playing. This home offers incredible space and storage, combining comfort with charm in a truly remarkable setting. School Pyramid is Little Run Elem, Frost Middle and Woodson HS.

PublicRemarks: Stunning Townhome with Three Fully Finished Levels, Ready for New Tenants! Welcome to this beautifully maintained townhome, where every detail is designed for comfort and style. The main level features a bright, sun-filled living room with elegant crown molding, fresh paint, and luxurious vinyl plank flooring throughout. The open-concept kitchen boasts abundant cabinetry, gas cooking, and an extended sunroom that opens onto a spacious deck—perfect for entertaining. Upstairs, the master suite is a serene retreat, complete with brand-new carpet, a cozy sitting area, a walk-in closet, and an attached master bathroom featuring a double vanity and standing shower. Two additional bedrooms and a well-appointed hall bathroom complete the upper level. The fully finished basement offers new flooring, a half bath, a laundry area, and a large recreational room that leads out to a fully fenced backyard—ideal for relaxing or play. Minutes to major routes (Route 50 & 28),  South Riding Market Square and other major shopping centers and restaurants. The community offers a scenic pond accented with a fountain, an impressive swimming pool, walking trails, a fitness facility, clubhouse, basketball courts, tennis courts, 2 tot lots and more!  The Dulles South Recreation & Community Center is walking distance! Perfect for family activities and fun!  This is a fantastic opportunity to purchase a move-in-ready home in an amazing neighborhood and location- just perfect for you and your family!  Welcome home!

PublicRemarks: Nestled in serene and lush green scenery and surrounded by 10 acres of usable land with 5 bed 3.5 bath three level colonial home. When you rent this home you are renting 10 acres of land with it  overlooking pastures, scenic views and hills offers so many possibilities for tenants. The property is located in close proximity to Leesburg, Dulles Airport, Aldie, Middleburg,, Haymarket, Chantilly, Rt. 50, and 15 and many commuter roads. Rent this charming brick-front home and be greeted by a classic layout, featuring a welcoming front hallway leading to a formal dining room and spacious living room. The main level boasts newer hardwood floors that guide you to a well-appointed kitchen with stainless steel appliances, pantry, desk station, and easy access to the rear yard with tiered composite decking and retractable awning – ideal for enjoying outdoor views with manageable sunrise and sunset. Adjacent to the kitchen is a convenient mudroom with storage and access to the 2-car garage. The family room is thoughtfully positioned to offer ample natural light and stunning views, with a cozy brick fireplace, wood-burning stove, and beautiful wood mantel. A half bath completes this level. Ascend the hardwood staircase to the upper level, where hardwood floors continue throughout the hallway and bedrooms. The primary bedroom features a walk-in closet, two additional closets, and an ensuite bathroom with a tub and dual sinks. The second, third, and fourth bedrooms are generously sized, all with hardwood floors. The spacious fifth bedroom, currently used as a playroom, provides flexibility to be utilized as a bedroom, office, or any other desired purpose. The upper level laundry room offers ample space for convenient setup. A full hallway bath completes this level. The finished lower level is sure to be the heart of family gatherings with an open recreation room with another brick fireplace, wood stove and mantle. A convenient kitchenette, complete with sink, dishwasher, and beverage refrigerator, is positioned next to the light-filled French door leading to the rear patio and landscaped backyard. An additional room off the rec room can be used as you wish; a den, play room, office, craft room or additional storage. Finishing this level is a full bathroom, additional storage space and utility closets. Enjoy the comfort, versatility, acreage of this serene property.

PublicRemarks: Welcome home to the highly sought-after community of Beech Tree Manor! Situated in a quiet cul de sac, this spacious five bedroom home boasts an open floorplan with plenty of updates on all four levels! On the main level, the expansive kitchen has been upgraded with stainless steel appliances, two-tone cabinets, quartz countertops, and a classic subway tile backsplash. You’ll be able to easily unload groceries with an exterior door leading directly between the kitchen and carport. Enjoy a casual meal in the light-filled eat-in area, with a gorgeous picture window flooding the space with natural light. Continue into the adjacent dining room, great for hosting dinner parties. Opening into the vast living room, this home’s layout is perfect for entertaining family and friends!  Upstairs, you’ll discover a large primary bedroom suite with a walk-in closet and refreshed en suite bathroom. Two additional sizable bedrooms share a renovated full bathroom with a double sink vanity and plenty of cabinet storage. Downstairs on the first lower level you’ll discover a recreation room with modern vinyl plank flooring, recessed lighting, and cozy fireplace. Two more private bedrooms and a recently renovated full bathroom with walk-in shower round out this level of the home. Down one more level, a second recreation room offers endless opportunities for bonus spaces like a home gym or media room, plus laundry and plenty of storage space. Step outside to enjoy the peacefulness of your huge fenced backyard and lovely stamped concrete patio, surrounded by mature trees for shade and privacy. On the front of the home, the carport and long driveway provide an abundance of room for parking. Just minutes to Giant Food, Aldi, Harris Teeter, Mosaic District, Eden Center, Seven Corners, Tyson’s Corner, Beech Tree Elementary, Holmes Run Stream Valley Park, Providence Recreation Center, and INOVA Fairfax. Quick access to I-495, Route 50, Gallows Road, Route 7, Columbia Pike, and Little River Turnpike. Schedule a private tour of your new home today!

Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

PublicRemarks: Escape to this serene end-unit townhome, offering privacy and a peaceful setting overlooking a winding creek that feeds into Lake Montclair. With a beautifully landscaped yard and outdoor spaces designed for relaxation, this home feels like a private retreat. The country-style kitchen has been thoughtfully updated with hardwood floors, granite countertops, recessed lighting, and stainless steel appliances. Step outside to the cement and paver patio, perfect for enjoying nature or gathering around a fire pit. Upstairs, all bedrooms feature vaulted ceilings and hardwood floors. The primary suite includes a soaking tub for unwinding, while recent updates like a new roof and refreshed kitchen ensure a move-in-ready experience. This home offers a one-car garage with additional off-street parking, and the Southlake at Montclair community provides access to a variety of amenities including a pool, tennis and basketball courts, and playgrounds. Plus, Montclair residents enjoy access to boating, fishing, beaches, and membership opportunities at a private golf course.      --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------All Richey Property Management residents must enroll in and purchase a Resident Benefits Package which includes liability insurance, credit building to help boost the resident’s credit score with timely rent payments, up to $1M Identity Theft Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! More details and options provided upon application.

PublicRemarks: Available for rent or purchase. Tenants go to McEnearney website to apply.  Welcome to an extraordinary property in Alexandria. Nestled on over three quarters of an acre behind a gated entrance you will feel tucked away with lots of space to live, entertain and relax in. The home is almost 6,000 sq ft of expansive elegant living. Walking inside the front door you are greeted with vaulted ceilings and a grand staircase. The main level features formal living room and dining room, office and gourmet kitchen with island open to a vaulted ceiling family room with gas fireplace. Step out side the sliding doors to one of the most amazing yards in Alexandria. There you find a huge pool, hot tub, putting green, gazebo, tiki bar with out side kitchen. The yard is wired for music and beautiful lighting. There's still lots of room to add a pool house, or an auxiliary living unit. So much space! Back in side, the upper level has 4 bedrooms including a primary ensuite with gas fireplace, sitting area, double closets  and large bathroom. Heading down to the lower level there is another gas fireplace, lots of room for a pool or pingpong table, plus a theatre room, another bedroom and workout/extra room. The oversized two car garage is set up for electric car charging. Located  in the highly sought after Fort Hunt community, you have access to great youth sports programs, community centers, including the Mount Vernon Community Center which is currently receiving a multi-million dollar renovation that will feature two ice rinks, swimming pool, fitness area. Just south of Old Town Alexandria, it's great for commuting, just a couple of miles from hwy 495, it's also just a short 20 minute drive Reagan International .Airport. During the summer months you are steps away from a farmer's market for fresh produce, baked goods, plants and more. Also located close by is the Sherwood Hall Library. Come see this hidden gem for yourself! It's really a one-of-a-kind property.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 5919 Waldo Drive, a wonderful brick-front New Castle model with a 2-car garage in Alexandria’s sought-after Kingstowne! There are neutral paint colors throughout, elegant moldings and gleaming hardwood floors on most of the main level. The kitchen features granite counters, stainless appliances, 42-inch cabinets, a center island, tasteful tile backsplash and a swan-neck faucet.  Just off the kitchen, the inviting breakfast/family room walks out to the terrific deck. Upstairs, the spacious owner’s suite has two walk-in closets and a unique barn door leading to the owner’s bath with its glass-enclosed shower, deep soaking tub and chic dual-sink vanity. There are two additional bedrooms and a full bath in the hall with a dual-sink vanity as well.  On the lower level, you’ll find the excellent rec room with a cozy gas fireplace, space for an office/gym and the third full bath. It walks out to the lovely patio. Kingstowne’s many amenities include pools, gyms, sports courts, walking trails and more! This fine residence is located super close to major commuter routes, Metro, two town centers, Fort Belvoir and Old Town Alexandria.

PublicRemarks: Discover this stunning corner townhome, perfectly prepared for its new tenants. This spacious residence features 3 bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms, and 1 half bathrooms, offering comfort and modern living at its finest. As you enter, you'll be greeted by an open foyer with elegant hardwood floors, a convenient half bath, and a generous recreational room that opens up to a fenced backyard—ideal for outdoor relaxation. The upper level boasts a sun-drenched living room with an abundance of windows. The updated kitchen is a chef’s dream, complete with custom white cabinetry, a stylish backsplash, stainless steel appliances, a large kitchen island, and luxurious quartz countertops. Upstairs, the bedroom level presents three roomy bedrooms and two full bathrooms. The master suite is a true retreat, featuring vaulted ceilings, a cozy sitting area, a walk-in closet, and a private en-suite bathroom with a double vanity, standing shower, and a soaking tub. The additional two bedrooms share a second full bath, providing ample space and comfort. This home is freshly painted and equipped with recessed lighting throughout, as well as garage parking for added convenience. Situated in a prime location, this townhome is a commuter’s paradise. Just minutes away from Rippon VRE Station, you'll have easy access to Quantico Marine Base, Fort Belvoir, the Pentagon, Springfield/Alexandria metro stations, and DC’s Union Station. The VRE commuter train offers a stress-free alternative when parking is scarce. Enjoy the nearby amenities of Stonebridge at Potomac Town Center, Occoquan, Featherstone National Wildlife Refuge, and Neabsco Regional Park. Plus, with quick access to I-95, Prince William County parks, Potomac Mills Shopping Mall, and a variety of dining options, you'll have everything you need right at your doorstep. This townhome is not just a place to live—it's a lifestyle upgrade waiting for you.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 5317 Oldcastle Lane, a beautifully updated single-family home in the heart of Springfield, VA. This completely remodeled residence features 3 spacious bedrooms and 1.5 modern bathrooms, blending comfort with modern design.  Step inside to discover a bright and open interior, where every detail has been meticulously crafted. The home features newly installed flooring, fully renovated bathrooms, an updated laundry room and closets, fresh paint, and new contemporary fixtures, all creating a welcoming and airy atmosphere throughout. The centerpiece of the home is a large, open-concept living area that flows seamlessly into a brand-new kitchen, boasting new appliances, custom cabinetry, and Quartz countertops - perfect for both everyday living and entertaining guests.  Outside, you'll find a charming fully fenced backyard ideal for outdoor activities and relaxation. Located in a desirable neighborhood within the sought-after Lake Braddock Secondary school district, this home provides easy access to top schools, major commuter routes (minutes to 495, 395, VRE train stations, Metro bus stops), parks (Burke Lake Park, Lake Accotink Park), and shopping, making it a perfect choice for those seeking a modern and move-in-ready home in Northern Virginia.

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option  **FAST Application Processing $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month.   Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. Case by Case There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Beautiful, renovated townhome backing to woodlands in a fabulous location! Just 2 miles from the Reston Metro, great access to the Dulles Toll Road and Reston Town Center as well! Bright open floor plan, gleaming hardwood floors, custom decorative moldings throughout, renovated kitchen, and a finished lower level are just some of the features making this home so special. Light-filled step-down living room opens to a deck overlooking a grassy rear yard and woodlands beyond providing privacy and the perfect spot for entertaining. Formal dining room opens to the renovated kitchen with gleaming granite countertops, 42-inch cabinetry, and stainless-steel appliances. A lovely half bath rounds out the main level. Upstairs you’ll find 3 bright and cheerful bedrooms, including the master bedroom with private en suite bath, and a well-appointed hall bath. The lower level recreation room offers plenty of space for games, media, and relaxation, while another half bath and large laundry/storage room and 2 assigned parking spaces add convenience.  Enjoy all the fabulous amenities Reston has to offers! This is one you won’t want to miss!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your dream home in the heart of historic Manassas—a magnificent Craftsman residence built in 2019 that epitomizes modern luxury with timeless charm. This exquisite six-bedroom, five-and-a-half-bath masterpiece offers an unparalleled living experience, seamlessly blending classic elegance with contemporary comfort.  You'll have room to spread out with a estimate total of over 5000 sq. ft. of spacious  living pleasure.  Upon entering, you'll be greeted by an inviting foyer with sophisticated chair railings and crown moldings that set the tone for the home’s refined interior. The spacious entry-level bedroom provides versatile living options, ideal for guests or multi-generational families seeking privacy and convenience. The heart of this home is its gourmet kitchen, a culinary haven designed to impress. Outfitted with premium upgraded countertops, a generous island, and state-of-the-art appliances—including a double oven, gas range, and built-in microwave—the kitchen is a chef’s delight. The adjoining family room, conveniently situated off the kitchen, creates a perfect setting for casual gatherings and everyday living. Rich wood floors grace the main living areas, enhancing the home’s warm and inviting atmosphere. Recessed lighting throughout highlights the beauty of the space, while elegant French and sliding glass doors seamlessly connect the indoors with the outdoors. The home’s energy-efficient Low-E windows and vinyl-clad frames ensure comfort year-round. The luxurious primary suite is a sanctuary of relaxation, featuring a spa-like bath designed for ultimate indulgence. Each additional bedroom and bath offers ample space and comfort, catering to the needs of a large or extended family.  An expansive utility provides additional storage or potential for future customization, adding to the home’s versatility. The beautiful  living room  fireplace,   ensures warmth and comfort through every season. Convenience is paramount with this property, as it is ideally situated in the historic district of Manassas. Enjoy easy access to transportation with Amtrak and the Virginia Railway Express (VRE) for smooth commuting. The Washington D.C. metro system, connected via Omni link bus service, further enhances connectivity. For frequent travelers, Dulles Airport is a mere 30 minutes away, and Reagan National Airport is just 50 minutes Manassas airport 1.5 miles. Immerse yourself in the charm of historic Manassas with its vibrant array of local restaurants and boutique shops. This home is not only a residence but a gateway to a rich cultural and culinary experience. Everything you need to make your moving experience enjoyable and seamless is right here. This residence is a splendid choice for those seeking a blend of luxurious living and historic charm, making it an ideal setting for family life and cherished memories. Apply On -line under application -Rent spree

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your private haven in the heart of Vienna!  This meticulously maintained 1-bedroom, 1-bathroom condo boasts a ceiling fan, plush carpet, and elegant window treatments.  The heart of the home is the open-concept living and dining area, featuring stunning hardwood floors and a private balcony. The kitchen is complete with a granite breakfast bar and the coveted convenience of gas cooking. The spacious bedroom has a walk-in closet and a luxurious bathroom, showcasing a granite countertop and modern fixtures.   Beyond your front door, a world of amenities awaits in the Marquis, including a pool, a well-equipped fitness center, a half basketball court, serene courtyards, a golf practice area, and a BBQ zone!  While you enjoy the dedicated 1-car parking space, you're also minutes away from the Commuter Rail Station, Vienna Metro station, and bus stops, making your daily commute a breeze.   Explore the vibrant neighborhood with easy access to the W&OD cycling and running trails, as well as the nearby Nottoway Park, offering ball fields, walking trails, tennis courts, a dog park, and summer concerts. With quick access to I-66 and proximity to the Mosaic District, Tyson's Corner, and downtown Fairfax, this condo offers the perfect blend of urban convenience and suburban charm. Don't miss this opportunity to experience the best of Vienna living. Schedule your showing today! ***2 Guest Parking Spaces Included!  Unit is accessible through parking garage, on its own private hallway for extra privacy!***

PublicRemarks: This rare 22nd-floor condo offers stunning views of Skyline Park from two balconies, accessible from both the living room and the kitchen. The spacious unit features 2 full bedrooms + enclosed den that can be used as a home office or 3rd bedroom. With beautiful hardwood floors throughout, fresh paint, and large windows that flood the open-concept living and dining area with natural light, this condo feels bright and inviting. The eat-in kitchen boasts granite countertops and brand-new appliances, including a microwave, dishwasher, stove, and HVAC system. The primary bedroom includes two closets—one of them a walk-in—and an en-suite bathroom with a separate shower and soaking tub.  Rent also includes a covered garage parking space and a storage unit in the basement. Skyline Square offers fantastic amenities, including 24-hour concierge service, an outdoor swimming pool, and a fitness center. This prime location is just a 2-minute walk to Target, CVS, Starbucks, and other conveniences, with easy access to multiple bus routes, including an express bus to the Pentagon. It’s also close to Dora Kelley Nature Park and provides quick access to 395, Bailey’s Crossroads, Alexandria, Shirlington, and National Airport. Please note that pets are not allowed, per condominium association rules.

PublicRemarks: A perfect 10! Like-new construction. Over 1,000sf. Top-Floor, SW corner 2BR/2BA condo in recently constructed Trafalgar Flats. Open floor plan with high-end features throughout, including the only unit in the building with a sliding glass door for the tub/shower in the Primary Bathroom. High ceilings and floor-to-ceiling windows galore let in tons of natural light from 2 directions. Trafalgar Flats is a premium building abutting the W&OD trail and the revitalized Columbia Pike corridor. This unit comes with 1 garage space and 1 large storage locker. The building offers a 24-hour fitness center, bike storage locker, club room, and outside patio with gas grills.  Easy commuting access anywhere via multiple means: car, public transportation, and bicycle. Shop at Harris Teeter - just 2 blocks away. Enjoy all that's new on Columbia Pike or take in Shirlington's many bars and restaurants. Move-in available in October! Check out the video tour link!

This spacious, sought after unit has a bright living room with a cozy balcony, a dining room and a previously updated kitchen with granite countertops and tile floors. All bedrooms have been updated with new carpets or LVT flooring and the entire unit has been painted. The bright primary bedroom has a spacious walk-in closet with shelves. The primary full bath has a tub shower, tile floors and it is located next to the primary bedroom on one side of the unit. On the other side of the unit, there are 2 other light-filled bedrooms with beautiful views. Both bedrooms have large closets. The second full bath has a tub shower and tile floors. There are plenty of closets along the hallway and a large pantry closet by the kitchen. Idylwood Tower comes with a range of amenities, including a fitness center, swimming pool, tennis courts and a tot lot, which fosters a sense of community among residents. The location is particularly advantageous, as you are just minutes away from major highways, making commutes to Washington, D.C. other surrounding areas easy. Additionally, the nearby neighborhoods offer parks, shopping centers and dining options, catering to various tastes and lifestyles.  With all theses features, living in this unit provides a perfect blend of suburban tranquility and urban accessibility, making it an ideal home for anyone seeking comfort and convenience in Northern Virginia.

AgentRemarks: Recently renovated with high-end materials and finishes, this beautiful home is a rare find! The owners spent many months meticulously designing and selecting all the custom features making this home a one-of-a-kind rental unit. They really do not want to move but due to job relocation, they are reluctantly renting out their home to one lucky tenant! The outdoor rear deck is also planned to be completed in a few weeks which adds additional features and outdoor living space.  The home has high-quality real solid walnut colored hardwood floors throughout the first and second level as well as matching oak stairs. The kitchen is perfectly matched with white quartz counter-tops with waterfall around the sitting area overlooking the dining room and exotic stone designed back splash. The soft close, white and gray solid wood cabinets have so many drawers that make kitchen tasks easier, matched perfectly with brass handles and glass doors.  High-end stainless-steel appliances, with smart features, induction cooktop and professional grade range hood. The laundry room is conveniently located next to the kitchen with high end washer and dryer, as well as a new soaking sink.  Laundry room connects to the two-car garage.  Upstairs you will find both the primary bathroom and hallway bathroom completely renovated with high-end finishes such as quartz countertops, 12x24 ceramic tiles, brass and black fixtures, large walk-in shower and led lights. New windows, doors, and other small features really make this home feel new inside. ***Tenant must have credit score over 700, income at least 3X the rent amount, good rental history, and no smoking allowed. One small hypoallergenic dog fully grown under 25lbs allowed with 500 pet deposit, 350 pet cleaning fee and 100 per month pet rent.***
