PublicRemarks: Enjoy quiet, comfortable living in Bucknell Manor, with easy access to the Potomac River, Old Town Alexandria, and the beauty of Fort Hunt and Mount Vernon. This three-bedroom, two bath cape features hardwood floors, a recently updated main-level bedroom and beautiful full bathroom, with an additional two bedrooms and remodeled full bathroom upstairs. The main-level living room leads to the kitchen with newer stainless-steel appliances, including a gas range. Off the kitchen to the rear of the home is an additional room, well suited as an office, TV room, or rec room. Enjoy cool evenings on the massive new back deck while your pet friends enjoy the fenced backyard. The lengthy driveway provides off-street parking for two vehicles, and the large exterior shed is perfect storage for lawn equipment and personal belongings. In addition to the wonderful amenities of this 1,188-square-foot home, the location is fantastic. The Mount Vernon Trail alongside the Potomac River is just one mile from the front door. Explore the colonial charm of Old Town Alexandria, just about 10 minutes away, or head south to check out George Washington’s Mount Vernon, about 15 minutes away. There’s an abundance of shopping throughout the area as well, with Belle View and Beacon Hill shopping centers both within a mile, not to mention the abundance of restaurants in Old Town, Fort Hunt, and the surrounding area.

Elegant Large Dining Table with 12 chairs, perfect for family gatherings and entertaining guests. The expansive deck is perfect for relaxing and meditation, while the large, private backyard is ideal for outdoor BBQs and gatherings of all sizes. The wood-burning outdoor fireplace adds a cozy touch to your outdoor entertainment. Enjoy the peace and quiet of a tree-lined lot.  Kids' Play Area: Includes a trampoline with slides and a seesaw, ensuring hours of fun for your children. A complete table tennis set for endless entertainment. Enjoy fresh, delicious fruit from your own persimmon tree. Benefit from brand new appliances, a new roof, and a state-of-the-art HVAC system ensuring your comfort and peace of mind year-round. Conveniently located near major roads, such as 66 and 29, this home offers easy access to all the essentials. Banks, shops, and other amenities are just a short drive away. Enjoy quick access to Wegmans, Home Depot, Walmart, and a variety of restaurants, movie theatre for your entertainment. Nearby parks, golf courses, wineries, and horse-riding stables offer endless outdoor recreation opportunities.  High rating school pyramid. The lower walk out level features a ballroom style open floor plan with a dance floor, a custom-made bar, custom home theater, dry sauna, and a gym. A true retreat, the expansive backyard features an outdoor kitchen and dining area, lush, grassy lawn, fire pit, and sparkling infinity edge pool and spa complete with Baja step and lounge area perfect for quintessential Northern Virginia entertaining. This magnificent residence offers a rare opportunity to live in a home rich in design and attention to detail, utilizing the highest quality materials in one of the world's most coveted zip codes just minutes away from the best nightlife, restaurants, and shopping neighboring Tysons Corner and Washington DC have to offer.

PublicRemarks: Austin Ridge’s Finest: 9 Gallery Road – A Stunning 5-Bedroom Colonial Welcome to 9 Gallery Road, where pride of ownership is evident from the moment you arrive. This beautiful 5-bedroom, 4-bath colonial is nestled in the heart of Austin Ridge and offers everything you need for luxurious living. The curb appeal is undeniable, with meticulously landscaped front and rear yards. The charming front porch welcomes you to the home, providing the perfect spot to unwind after a long day. As you step inside, the elegance of rich hardwood floors greets you in the foyer and extends into the formal dining room and family room. The formal living room exudes a stately ambiance, complete with columns and crown molding. The formal dining room is equally impressive, featuring a bay window, chair rail, and decorative custom moldings. The gourmet kitchen is a chef’s dream, boasting granite countertops, upgraded cabinetry with crown molding, double ovens, a gas range, a center island, a built-in desk area, recessed lighting, and a spacious walk-in pantry that can easily accommodate a second refrigerator or freezer. The ceramic tile flooring and backsplash add a touch of sophistication to the space. The family room is truly a showstopper, with its dramatic two-story ceiling and abundant natural light streaming through numerous windows. The floor-to-ceiling gas fireplace creates a cozy focal point. The main level also includes a bedroom with carpet and a full bath perfect for the parents/in-laws or guests. The laundry room has been updated with matching ceramic tile flooring and wainscot, adding both style and functionality. Upstairs, the expansive master suite offers a luxurious retreat with two walk-in closets, a sitting area, a fireplace hookup, and a tray ceiling. The master bath has been elegantly updated with a tile floor, dual vanities, a walk-in tiled shower, a soaking tub, and a spacious linen closet. Two additional bedrooms with generous closets and a full bath complete the upper level, along with a versatile loft area perfect for an office or playroom. The finished basement is a sports fanatic’s dream, featuring a bar area with recessed lighting and billiards-ready flooring. It also includes a legal 5th bedroom with a full bath and home gym area. Situated on an impeccably manicured corner lot, this property is perfect for outdoor enthusiasts. The fully fenced backyard features a slate stone patio, a retractable awning, a 10 x 8 shed, and a 9-zone sprinkler system. Home features solar panels which create enough power to virtually have no electric bill! Austin Ridge offers a prime location just 5 minutes from I-95, with easy access to walking and biking trails, shopping, and dining. Publix Market is only 1.8 miles away, and commuting to MCB Quantico, Fort Belvoir, the DC Metro Area, and the Pentagon is a breeze. This home is a must-see! Schedule your showing today and be sure to check out our virtual tour. Don't miss this GEM!!! All GEM Realty residents are enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $39.95/month which includes liability insurance, credit building to help boost the resident’s credit score with timely rent payments, up to $1M Identity Theft Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, on-demand pest control, and much more! More details upon application.

AgentRemarks: 4-Level Townhouse in Gated Community – Available Now Discover this elegant 4-level townhouse located in a charming gated community. The home boasts a spiral staircase that gracefully leads to the main living quarters, featuring stunning hardwood floors throughout the main level. Enjoy cozy evenings in the family room with a fireplace, or step out onto the balcony with a pergola ceiling for outdoor relaxation and entertaining.  The lower level has a full bathroom, built in cabinets and desk for office space use with access to the backyard bricked patio. Highlights: Living Space: The open floor plan includes high-quality finishes and trim in the dining and living rooms, with ceilings reaching nine and ten feet high. Natural light streams through tall windows, creating a bright and inviting atmosphere. Kitchen & Appliances: The modern kitchen is equipped with stainless steel appliances and granite countertops. Additional upgrades include a central vacuum system and two fireplaces. Bedrooms & Bathrooms: Primary Bedroom: Features a slanted ceiling, ample closet space, and an ensuite bathroom with a shower and soaking tub. Second Bedroom: Ideal for an office or guest room, with its own full bath. Fourth Level: Includes a bedroom, full bath, and a cozy sitting area, offering privacy and flexibility. Outdoor Spaces: Enjoy the private balcony off the living room, perfect for entertaining, and a fenced patio off the office/recreation room, providing added privacy. Location: Situated less than a mile from Tyson’s Metro stations and Mall, with excellent access to major routes such as Rte 7, 123, 66, and the beltway. This townhouse is available immediately and offers both luxury and convenience in a sought-after location. Don’t miss the chance to make this your new home!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 1051 Kelso Road, a magnificent all-brick colonial nestled on a beautifully manicured lot. This home offers a total of 7 bedrooms and 4.5 bathrooms, providing ample space for comfortable living. The expansive main level features a large eat-in kitchen, ample-sized living and dining rooms, a cozy family room, and a convenient bedroom and ensuite full bath, ideal for multi-generational living. Additional highlights include an enormous, fully conditioned sunroom, deck, two fireplaces, a convenient powder room, a large laundry room, and an oversized three-car garage.  The upper level showcases four bedrooms, one of which has been converted into a home office, and two full baths, providing flexibility for various living arrangements. The primary suite has a fireplace, two walk-in cedar closets, and a full bath with a soaking tub and stall shower. With a separate entrance from inside the home or from the private rear patio, the basement is perfectly designed as an au pair or in-law suite. It has a full kitchen, three additional rooms, a large walk-in closet, and a full bath. This space also includes its own washer and dryer, so those living here can be completely independent. The basement also contains lots of additional storage space.  Please note that the property is on a total of six acres. Four acres of the property, including the stables and adjacent paddocks, are used as horse boarding facilities. Tenants will have full access to the fully fenced two-acre parcel that the house sits on, and all lawn care is included in the rent.   Minimum rental requirements include a 12-month lease and no more than two incomes to qualify.

PublicRemarks: Experience the charm of this first-time rental townhome in the picturesque Hallcrest Heights, conveniently located near downtown McLean, Tysons Corner, and within walking distance to the McLean Metro Station. This beautifully renovated townhome boasts a fully updated interior, featuring an updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a bay window overlooking the landscaped backyard. The window treatments are all Hunter Douglas, adding both elegance and functionality to each room. The main floor also includes a separate dining room, spacious living room, and a powder room. The light fixtures in the kitchen, dining room, and stairs were selected carefully to complement the home's interior color and finished palette, creating a warm and inviting ambiance. Additionally, recessed lighting throughout the home adds a modern touch and enhances the overall atmosphere. The basement level offers a bonus room ideal for a home office, a full bathroom, and a welcoming living area with a wood-burning fireplace, wet bar, and full fridge. Step outside to the beautiful backyard with a flagstone patio, featuring a semicircular knee-high stone wall surrounded by carefully selected plants and soft lighting, perfect for relaxing and unwinding with friends and family. On the third floor, you'll find a spacious master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom and a large walk-in closet, along with two additional bedrooms and a full bathroom. The hall bathroom features a luxurious soaking tub, perfect for unwinding after a long day. The bathrooms were all renovated in 2016, featuring natural stone finishes, with marble adorning the entire master bath and basement bathroom floor. Freshly painted, this property exudes a delightful ambiance with hardwood floors throughout. This townhome is a commuter's dream, with easy access to 495, 267, Rt 7, and Rt 123, as well as close proximity to the toll-free Dulles International Airport access road. It also includes 2 assigned parking spaces, ample visitor parking, and access to community green spaces.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this inviting townhome in the desirable Oak Spring community, featuring recent updates and a prime location backing to Lake Fairfax and protected woodlands. With 3 bedrooms, 2.5 bathrooms, and 3 levels of living space, this home is perfect for both relaxing and entertaining. The main level boasts gleaming hardwood floors in the formal living and dining areas, leading to a spacious, eat-in kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, abundant cabinets, and a separate pantry. The kitchen opens to an expansive rear deck, offering privacy and serene views of mature trees and wooded parkland. Upstairs, the large primary bedroom features a vaulted ceiling, walk-in closet, and a private en-suite bathroom with a combination bathtub and shower. Two additional bedrooms share an updated hall bathroom and a linen closet. The finished walkout basement includes a rec/family room with a cozy wood-burning stove, a laundry room, and two generous storage areas. Recent updates total $50,000 and include a new roof, siding, trim, refurbished deck, sliding doors, cleaned carpets, painted interiors, privacy fences, new gutters, and a new patio. The bike-friendly community is near Reston Association trails and offers ample parking, including two assigned spaces and visitor parking. Enjoy easy access to Lake Fairfax Park, the Wiehle-Reston Metro Silver Line, Reston Station, shopping, dining, and Dulles Airport.       --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------All Richey Property Management residents must enroll in and purchase a Resident Benefits Package which includes liability insurance, credit building to help boost the resident’s credit score with timely rent payments, up to $1M Identity Theft Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! AgentRemarks: This stylish 1-bedroom condo, just a 10-minute walk from Huntington Metro, offers the perfect blend of urban convenience and suburban tranquility. Ideal for first-time renters or anyone seeking a vibrant lifestyle, this home is your gateway to everything Alexandria has to offer. Enjoy easy access to I-495 and a quick drive to Old Town Alexandria, with dining, shopping, and entertainment close by. All utilities—electric, heating, cooling, water, and sewer—are included, making budgeting a breeze. Resort-style amenities, including a swimming pool, tennis courts, and a fitness center, enhance your daily life. Inside, the open-concept living and dining area, flooded with natural light, is perfect for entertaining and relaxing. The modern kitchen features a breakfast bar, ideal for quick meals or a work-from-home setup. Step out to your private patio and enjoy the beautifully landscaped grounds with mature trees. This condo is more than just a rental—it’s a lifestyle. Don’t miss out—schedule your visit today!

AgentRemarks: Recently Updated Single-Family Home on a Spacious 1.7-Acre Lot in Leesburg Surrounded by multi-million dollar homes and with no HOA, this beautifully renovated single-family home offers the perfect blend of comfort, privacy, and convenience. Situated on 1.7 acres, the property features refinished solid hardwood flooring throughout the main and upper levels, with carpet and luxury vinyl plank (LVP) flooring on the lower level. The home boasts brand new appliances, a new washer and dryer conveniently located on the main level, and a generous 1,280 sq ft wrap-around porch. The main level includes a formal dining room, a spacious living room, an eat-in kitchen perfect for family meals, and a library/office room. The master bedroom comes with an attached full bathroom, while two additional bedrooms and a second full bathroom provide ample space for family or guests. There's also access to a covered porch, offering a serene outdoor space to unwind and enjoy the scenic surroundings. The fully finished lower level includes a dedicated home office (which can be used as a bedroom, though not to code) and an additional full bathroom. A walk-up basement entrance provides easy access to the backyard, enhancing the versatility and functionality of this space. The expansive property features open areas and mature trees, offering both privacy and natural beauty. Conveniently located near major roads and local amenities, this home ensures easy access to shopping centers like Brambleton Town center, schools, healthcare facilities, and recreational areas.

PublicRemarks: This charming stone-front 3-bedroom cottage with bonus room will welcome you into the peaceful oasis of Sleepy Hollow, a park-like neighborhood of old-growth trees and large lots, with easy access to Rt 50 and the Beltway, only 8 miles from the DC line.   The main home features hardwood floors throughout, 2.5 baths (including a brand-new master bath), an updated kitchen, a den with built-in bookshelves, and a sunroom.  Across the shaded flagstone patio is a spacious two-car garage.  And above the garage, you'll find the perfect place to work or relax in privacy: a bright, serene carpeted room with its own entrance and (brand new) full bath with rain showerhead.   There's plenty of room for entertaining outdoors in the almost half-acre lot, and foragers of all ages will enjoy harvesting a snack from the fruiting plants, including a sour cherry, blueberries, red currants, raspberries, plum tree and fig tree.  The gracious driveway is bordered by a curving stone wall with embedded exterior lighting and lined with dogwoods, a lilac, and a lane of hydrangeas. The Sleepy Hollow neighborhood includes an active neighborhood watch program with up to 2 drive-throughs per day and a community association that sponsors several neighborhood events, including a fall and spring picnic, catered wine tasting evening, Halloween costume parade with band, and other events.  A neighborhood list serv connects the community and provides assistance and advice.  If you are looking to easily establish roots in the DC area, the Sleepy Hollow community will impress you.   Include yard care for an additional $200/month.  No smoking.  Pets with prior approval.  Maximum 2 unrelated adults.  Application fee of $65.95 and earnest money deposit check(s) made payable to Promax Management, Inc.

AgentRemarks: Please contact Sharon with Bay Property Management Group at scail@bmgnva.com or call 703-843-6495 with any questions you have about the property. Please Direct Your Clients To https://baymgmtgroupnorthvirginia.appfolio.com/listings To Pay For And Fill Out The Rental Application. PETSCREENING IS A PART OF THE APPLICATION PROCESS. We use a third-party screening service and require all applicants with an animal to complete a pet profile or request accommodation for an assistance animal. Please have your client submit their profile at https://baymgmt- virginia.petscreening.com/, if applicable Owner will consider cats and small dogs on a case by case basis. Applicants will need complete a pet profile with PetScreening.com to ensure we have formalized pet and animal-related policy and accurate records. Application Qualifications: We require Minimum monthly income 3 times the tenant's portion of the monthly rent, acceptable rental history, credit history and criminal history consistent with Virginia law. The landlord is exempt from accepting any source of funds pursuant to Virginia Code Section 36-96.2(I), and therefore does not accept housing vouchers at this property. All residents are automatically enrolled in the Resident Benefits Package (RBP) for $42.95/month, which includes renters insurance, credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments, $1M Identity Protection, HVAC air filter delivery (for applicable properties), move-in concierge service making utility connection and home service setup a breeze during your move-in, our best-in-class resident rewards program, and much more! The Resident Benefits Package is a voluntary program and may be terminated at any time, for any reason, upon thirty (30) days’ written notice. Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

In the fully renovated eat-in kitchen, you’ll find sleek granite countertops, stainless steel appliances, and a spacious breakfast room. The light-filled living room features large floor-to-ceiling windows and a cozy gas fireplace. With modern elegant architectural features, the adjacent formal dining room is perfect for entertaining. Upstairs, the expansive primary suite includes a stunning vaulted ceiling, walk-in closet, and spa-like en suite bathroom. Two additional bedrooms both feature dramatic high ceilings and large closets, with a second full bathroom in the hall. The lower level of the home offers an additional living space with beautiful built-in shelving, a private fourth bedroom, and third full bathroom. From this level, walk out onto the patio to relax in your fenced backyard, or enjoy your morning cup of coffee on the wide wooden deck with a peaceful tree-lined surround. On the front of the home, the one car garage and driveway provide you with plenty of space for storage and parking. Community playground right next door! The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant(s) agree to be enrolled and to pay the applicable monthly TOTAL cost of $45.95 per household.  Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. --------------------------------------------------------  Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card).  If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

Stop by and check out this gem! It wont last long!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your dream Colonial home, nestled within the highly coveted Langley School Pyramid. This residence has been meticulously remodeled, presenting three finished levels of sophisticated, 3,000 square feet of finished luxurious living space. Upon entry, you'll be welcomed by a light-filled living room, perfect for relaxing or entertaining. The adjacent family room, featuring a beautifully refinished wood-burning fireplace and a wall of built-ins, offers a cozy yet elegant ambiance. The formal dining room is ideal for hosting dinner parties, while the adjoining breakfast room provides a casual space for morning meals. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's delight, boasting top-of-the-line stainless steel appliances, gleaming granite countertops, recessed lighting, and ample cabinet space, making it both functional and stylish. Upstairs, the home offers four generously sized bedrooms, including a serene and private primary suite. This retreat includes a luxurious bathroom with modern finishes and a spacious walk-in closet that will cater to your storage needs with ease. The lower level is a true entertainer's paradise, featuring a second refinished fireplace that adds warmth and charm to the space. The walk-out basement is complete with a full bath, a wet bar, and an additional bedroom, perfect for guests or as a private office.  Step outside to your personal oasis—a stunning swimming pool with a spa, all set within a fully fenced, private lot that backs to tranquil woods. Whether you're hosting summer gatherings or enjoying a peaceful evening swim, this outdoor space is the perfect backdrop for creating lasting memories.  There is an electric car charging port in the garage. Conveniently located just minutes from Fairfax County Parkway, Reston Town Center, Tysons Corner, and Dulles Airport, this home offers the ultimate combination of luxury and convenience in one exceptional package. Don't miss the opportunity to make this extraordinary property your own! Owner will pay for landscaping and pool maintenance.

PublicRemarks: Welcome home to highly-sought after Cameron Station! This luxurious brick front townhome boasts gorgeous modern finishes on all 4 levels in the rarely available Somerset model. The spacious main level of the home offers an open floorplan with gleaming hardwood floors and an abundance of windows flooding the space with natural light. In the stunning chef’s kitchen you’ll discover a plethora of contemporary Shaker-style cabinets, stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a classic tile backsplash.  Pull up a stool to the wrap-around breakfast bar or enjoy a casual meal in the adjoining morning room. With an open concept and cozy gas fireplace, this home is ideal for hosting dinner parties and entertaining. Upstairs, all four bedrooms feature plush carpeting and large closets. The primary bedroom includes a bright and modern en suite bathroom with a double sink vanity, soothing soaking tub, and frameless glass door shower. On the top level, the light-filled loft with a dramatic vaulted ceiling would work as a 5th bedroom, playroom, or guest space. AgentRemarks: Discover the charm of this stunning, unfurnished ( for a one 1 year lease or longer) or fully furnished 3-level townhouse in the historic Fairlington Arbor Community. Spanning 1,500 sqft, this 2-bedroom, 2-bath home offers an inviting blend of modern comfort and classic elegance. Nestled among mature trees, the community boasts an array of amenities designed for your enjoyment. The home features a versatile den or guest room in the finished basement, perfect for visitors or a home office, along with the convenience of an assigned parking spot. As you approach, you’re greeted by a welcoming front stoop leading to an entryway with a spacious coat closet. Inside, the sun-drenched, open-concept living and dining rooms are adorned with detailed crown molding and gleaming hardwood floors. The master bedroom offers two large closets, and ample storage is found throughout the home, including in the additional bedrooms and hallways. The fully finished basement is a standout feature, complete with a cozy family room, a versatile den or spare guest room, a full bathroom, and laundry facilities. Step outside to your private, fenced-in backyard—an ideal space for entertaining, grilling, or simply relaxing amidst the greenery. The backyard is equipped with outdoor furniture and a grill, making it a perfect extension of your living space. The Fairlington community is rich with amenities, including a community center, pool, tennis courts, a state-of-the-art playground, and a vibrant farmers market. Enjoy the convenience of nearby Bradlee Shopping Center, Shirlington Village, I-395, and easy access to DC, The Pentagon, Del Ray, Old Town, and more. With its prime location, excellent condition, and array of features, this townhouse is a perfect place to call home. Please note, there is a non-refundable pet fee of $500. Don’t miss this opportunity to live in one of Northern Virginia’s most desirable communities!

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option  **FAST Application Processing $0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros.  The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month.   Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.  -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old.  Case by Case There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

This home offers 10-foot ceilings, walls of windows, loads of sunlight, upscale kitchen with granite and new stainless steel appliances, and gorgeous views! Freshly painted throughout; hardwood floors; dual-zone HVAC; huge primary bedroom suite with sitting area, luxury bath with ceramic tile floors, soaking tub, super-sized shower, dual vanity. A commuter’s dream, the home is just minutes from all major connectors and less than 30 minutes from Washington’s two primary airports – Reagan National and Dulles International. A MUST SEE!

AgentRemarks: Amazing Townhouse in the heart of the desirable Kingstowne community. This beautiful 2BD/3BA home has an updated kitchen with granite countertops and an  oversized, eat-in breakfast bar. The open concept with beautiful wood floors on the main floor is an excellent use of space, and it walks out to a spacious deck with great privacy because the house backs to the woods. The primary suite upstairs is a light-filled loft with a privacy door and a continuation of the incredible wood floors from the main floor.  It also provides a large walk-in closet and has an en-suite bathroom with a double vanity, stand-up shower, and large soaking tub. The basement is an excellent living/relaxing/entertaining space has well.  It has a spacious main area that opens to a beautiful paver patio and a small fenced-in backyard. It also contains a full bath with a standup shower, and a laundry room with included washer and dryer.  The community amenities are 100% included. There are 2 pools, 2 tennis courts, 2 gyms, and 4 running trails to fulfill your indoor and outdoor recreational needs. Last but not least, it's  less than 10 minutes to Fort Belvoir, the Franconia-Springfield Metro stop, Springfield mall, Wegmans, Kingstowne Town Center, and tons of restaurants, retail stores, and grocery stores.

PublicRemarks: Nestled in the heart of Dunn Loring/Vienna, Virginia, this 3-level brick townhome with 3 spacious bedrooms, 3.5 baths offer the perfect balance of convenience, comfort, and charm. With a generous floor area of approximately 2,204 square feet, this free-flowing layout is graced with large, inviting windows that fill each room with pleasant views. The front yard faces the community park, and the back of the house faces woods, making for a relaxing experience.  Key property features include a dog-friendly environment, one designated parking spot with ample additional parking and overflow parking near the house, and you are in close proximity to a host of places such as restaurants, department stores, and several renowned educational institutions. This home is near both Dunn Loring and Idylwood Parks, the popular W&OD Trail, and Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts, as well as being strategically located between Dunn Loring and Tysons Metro stations.  Dulles and National Airports, along with Inova Fairfax Hospital are easy to reach as well.  Within the home, you'll find the beautifully updated kitchen with stainless steel appliances, freshly refinished living and dining room hardwoods (Aug 29, 2024), new windows, newly installed recreation room carpet, and more allowing for a smooth and well-organized domestic experience.   The recreation room doors open to a large, fenced back yard with a storage shed.  The laundry room contains a full-size washer and dryer, folding table, and shelves.  As part of your rent, you'll also benefit from complimentary garbage and recycling service, and yard maintenance to ensure your home remains pristine. The front yard maintenance is full service. The back yard maintenance consists of grass cutting and leaf removal, provided you leave the gate open for entry on those days. Fairfax County Public Schools are award-winning, and this property is in the Marshall HS tier, with all schools nearby.  There are several swimming pools nearby who accept applications when openings are available.  Pets are approved on a case-by-case basis.  Applications are available online, and are processed Mon-Fri between 9A-4P with a maximum of 2 qualifying incomes.  The Security Deposit equals one month’s rent.  The pet deposit is $650.  No more than 3 unrelated residents.  No Smoking.  The property is available for a minimum lease of 12 months and a maximum 35 months, with immediate occupancy available with proper qualifications. PublicRemarks: 6 or 9 month lease options are also available !! Rent Reduced ..... Welcome to Gateway Commons in Stone Ridge, Loudoun County, VA—a beautifully master-planned community offering a vibrant yet easy-going suburban lifestyle. This stunning, North East-facing Essex model end-unit townhouse by award-winning Van Metre is the epitome of modern living, offering unique privacy with its serene pond-facing location. The brick-front, three-level home spans over 2,600 square feet, featuring 3 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and a two-car garage. As you enter the home, the lower level welcomes you with a spacious recreation room that opens to the backyard. The main level is perfect for entertaining, with a formal dining area, a living room with a cozy fireplace, and a gourmet kitchen outfitted with stainless steel appliances and upgraded cabinets. The kitchen also features a breakfast nook that leads to a custom rear deck, ideal for outdoor dining with peaceful pond views. Upstairs, the luxurious primary bedroom offers trey ceilings, a walk-in closet, and a master bath with dual vanities. Two additional spacious bedrooms, a linen closet, and a convenient laundry room complete the upper level. This home is wired for CAT 7 cable and boasts hardwood flooring throughout. Conveniently located near Aldie Shopping Center, Dulles Landing Shopping Center, South Riding Center, Stone Springs Hospital, and various retail centers, this property is also situated in a highly regarded school district. You'll be within walking distance of the Stone Ridge Village Center, where you can enjoy shops, restaurants, and more. Residents have access to multiple pools, a clubhouse, tennis courts, a fitness center, miles of walking trails, and a host of community events. Onsite schools, daycare centers, and easy access to major thoroughfares like Routes 50 and 28 make this location incredibly convenient—just under 20 minutes from Dulles Airport, with the Blue Ridge Mountains on the horizon. Gateway Commons truly is the gateway to an energetic, suburban lifestyle. Please note: This home is owner-occupied. Showings are by confirmed appointment only. Requirements :  - Credit score of 700 + - Income at least 2.5 X the rent - No bankruptcy or eviction records Hurry… you don't want to miss this beautiful home!

AgentRemarks: ** Beautiful renovated home***Furniture if included will be $500/month additional to the rent price.  Solid brick home on private lot surrounded on 3 sides by common HOA treed, natural property. Public water. 4 wood burning fireplaces. Hardwood, 6 bedrooms, 4.5 baths. High-end gourmet kitchen. Sunroom w/heated floor. 3-car garage w/space for woodworking. Plenty of additional driveway parking. DETAILS: kitchen boasts professional grade appliances and coffee/wet bar. Meticulously remodeled to maintain the integrity of the home, while providing the highest end custom cabinets, and luxurious granite countertops, that flow seamlessly up the entire backsplash. Raised panel custom cabinetry includes details such as custom spice drawer, pull out dish drawers, self-closing drawers. Appliances include: Sub-zero refrigerator, 6-burner, professional-grade Thermador gas range w/ electric oven/convection oven with slide out racks, GE profile microwave/convection oven combination, and a Thermador dishwasher. Kitchen extends to family room w/ matwet bar/coffee bar features additional custom cabinetry, large bar sink, built-in Bosch European coffee maker that serves coffees, expresso, cappuccino and lattes, a U-Line beverage refrigerator and second full-size Bosch D/W. **. DINING ROOM features a breakfast bar for a quick snack. The living space continues into the family room with expansive built-ins, a magnificent window overlooking wooded property substantial fireplace w/ sitting hearth where the family can relax, roast marshmallows, and enjoy the warmth of a fire. From the family room, French double doors swing wide to a completely remodeled 4 season sunroom with Anders windows on three sides that take in the serene beauty of the backyard, and bridle path that runs along the back lot line. The sunroom is heated with radiant heated tile floor. From the sunroom, you can wonder outside to the new maintenance free composite deck and enjoy the afternoon sun or a relaxing morning with a hot drink. Continue down the stairs to the new flagstone patio just out from the walk out family room in basement. A great outdoor space for cookouts and relaxing - day or night. ** Main level PRIMARY BDRM w/black & white marble seated shower, whirlpool tub and double sinks. Separate dressing area with vanity. ** Gather in the LIVING ROOM in front of 1 of 4 wood burning fireplaces with white mantle and marble surround. , Just down the hall is the main-level Primary Bedroom Suite complete with sitting area, dressing area and spa bath that was completely redesigned with marble tile, Thomasville vanities with soft close drawers, jetted tub, and large walk in shower with frameless glass door, seat and strong pressure rain water shower head. Continue UPSTAIRS to 4 spacious bedrooms & 2 full baths that have been completely remodeled. On your way up the stairs, you will notice another imported crystal chandelier. The new bathrooms have shaker vanities with ample storage and self-closing drawers. Both bathrooms have two integrated sinks each with quartz countertops. The new bathrooms are accompanied by all new tile, hardware and toilets, fans, lights. One bath includes a tub with shower, and the Jack/Jill bath has a walk-in shower with magnificent tile work, ** Please apply through RentSpree application attached and we will forward all applications immediately to owner.

AgentRemarks: Welcome to your dream home in the heart of Leesburg! This well maintained 4-bedroom, 2.5-bath townhome offers a perfect blend of modern convenience and suburban tranquility. Nestled in a private, area this home provides an ideal setting for comfortable living and effortless entertaining. Key Features: Spacious Living: With four generously sized bedrooms, including a large master suite, there’s plenty of room for everyone. The 2.5 baths are beautifully appointed, ensuring convenience and comfort. Modern Amenities: The well-kept interior boasts a contemporary design with high-quality finishes, an open-concept kitchen, and ample storage. Enjoy cooking in a modern kitchen equipped with stainless steel appliances and sleek countertops. Community Charm: Located in a private, serene neighborhood, this townhome offers a safe and peaceful environment. The community is known for its friendly atmosphere and well-maintained surroundings, making it perfect for families and professionals alike. Prime Location: Leesburg is renowned for its excellent schools, vibrant local shops, and beautiful parks. Enjoy easy access to major highways, making commuting a breeze. The area offers a perfect blend of suburban charm and urban convenience. Outdoor Living: Relax and unwind in your private backyard, ideal for summer barbecues or a quiet evening under the stars. The neighborhood also features beautifully landscaped common areas, perfect for a morning jog or an evening stroll. Don’t miss the opportunity to make this stunning townhome your own. Experience the best of Leesburg living with a home that combines comfort, style, and a fantastic location. PublicRemarks: This first-floor apartment at 43176 Tall Pines Court, Suite 1, offers a unique combination of comfort and convenience in a highly sought-after Ashburn, VA location. Part of the prestigious Toll Brothers' Mansion Collection, this apartment boasts spacious, well-designed rooms, with over 1,100 square feet of living space. The apartment features a large, sunlit living room perfect for relaxation or entertaining, and an adjacent dining area that seamlessly connects to a generously sized kitchen. The kitchen is equipped with modern appliances and ample counter space, making it ideal for those who enjoy cooking or need space for meal preparation. The bedroom area, though open without a door, offers a sense of privacy and tranquility, enhanced by a walk-in closet for added storage and organization..This is a true one-bedroom apartment, offering more space and versatility than a studio. The bedroom is complemented by a full bathroom, ensuring convenience and comfort. A small nook within the apartment is perfect for a home office or study area, making it an excellent choice for those who work from home and need a quiet, dedicated workspace. Additional amenities include a full-size washer and dryer within the unit, adding to the convenience of daily living. The apartment comes with one off-street parking space, ensuring easy access and security for your vehicle. The owners take care of all utilities, including high-speed internet access, allowing tenants to enjoy a hassle-free living experience. This apartment is perfect for someone seeking a spacious, comfortable, and well-located home with all the necessary amenities included.

PublicRemarks: Discover the charm of this beautifully renovated home, perfectly situated on a coveted private corner lot in the heart of Chantilly. This expansive 4 bedroom, 4.5 bath single-family delivers over 4,200 square feet on 3 finished levels, providing ample space for your lifestyle needs. A tailored brick and siding exterior, an oversized concrete driveway and 2-car garage, and fenced yard with patio surrounded by majestic trees create instant outdoor appeal. ****** Inside, an open floor plan, high ceilings, decorative moldings, a soft neutral designer color palette, stylish new wide plank flooring and plush new carpet, chic upgraded lighting, and an abundance of windows that fill the space with natural light are just a few features that make this home special. An upgraded kitchen with brand new stainless steel appliances, upgraded baths, a luxurious owner’s suite, generously sized bedrooms each with ensuite baths, and a fully finished lower level with a recreation room, media room and den with attached bath creates an inviting ambiance and unparalleled convenience. ****** Rich wide plank flooring greets you in the foyer and flows into the formal living room where a bay window fills the space with light, steps away, the formal dining room is accented by a shimmering chandelier adding refined style. The spacious family room with walls of windows beckons you to relax and unwind in front of a cozy gas fireplace serving as the focal point of the room. The gourmet kitchen is a feast for the eyes with gleaming granite countertops, an abundance of 42” cabinetry, center island, a pantry, planning desk, and new stainless steel appliances including a gas range. The adjoining breakfast room with a graceful bow of windows is the ideal spot for daily dining, while a glass door to the patio and the open atmosphere facilitates entertaining. A powder room and laundry room compliment the main level. ****** Upstairs, the gracious owner’s suite boasts a soaring cathedral ceiling with display ledge and contemporary lighted ceiling fan, plush new carpet, a walk-in closet, and a sitting are in front of a graceful bow of windows. The ensuite bath features dual granite topped vanities, sleek lighting and fixtures, a water closet, soaking tub and glass enclosed shower, the finest in personal pampering. Down the three light filled bedrooms, each new carpet enjoys access to either a well-appointed private or dual entry bath with granite topped vanities. ****** The walkup lower level with plush carpet and recessed lighting is sure to be a popular destination for family and friends and features an expansive recreation room, a media room, and a den/5th bedroom that enjoys private access to the 4th full bath, making it an excellent guest suite. ****** Nestled in a peaceful setting in the heart of a thriving community with access to top-notch schools. Located in the legal subdivision of Rockland Village, you'll enjoy a welcoming community and convenient access to local amenities. Don't miss out on this incredible rental opportunity. Get ready to move into your dream home!

Two more bedrooms, a pretty hall bath with bathtub, and a laundry room are also on the second level. Head up one more set of stairs to enjoy the amazing rooftop terrace with its pergola. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details. -------------------------------------------------------- Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros.  The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month.   Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: -              Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier -              HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. -              Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services -              A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. -              Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. -              $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders -              24/7 online maintenance reporting -              Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. -              Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. -              Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.  -------------------------------------------------------- Pet-Friendly Pet Policy  This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old.  Case by Case There is a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 per pet if paid by ACH (or $25 if paid by credit card). There is no charge for profiles with no pets, and no charge for accommodation requests for assistance animals. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Welcome to this gorgeous two-level townhome built by Miller & Smith, featuring four bedrooms, an office, and two and a half bathrooms. Boasting a two-car garage, this townhome is perfect for those seeking a single-family home experience. The property has been fully upgraded, with carpeted bedrooms, and upgraded hardwood floors on the main level. The main level also features hardwood stairs and an upper loft, an updated mudroom with new tile flooring, custom-built storage cabinets, high ceilings, and custom appointments throughout.  The open floor plan includes a formal dining room and a main library/office. The gourmet kitchen showcases new quartz countertops, a large center island, a breakfast bar, and stainless-steel appliances, including a refrigerator and cooktop. You can relax in the family room off the kitchen, which has custom-built cabinetry and a cozy gas fireplace.  On the spacious upper level, you'll find a large open loft that can be used as an office or another family room/den area, four bedrooms, and two full bathrooms. The lovely master suite has a large walk-in closet and a luxurious bathroom with separate granite vanities, a separate shower, and a soaking tub.  Enjoy the beautifully landscaped fenced-in backyard with a custom-designed stone patio that offers a perfect escape after a long day. Brambleton offers many amenities, including pools, a clubhouse, tennis courts, tot lots, and miles of walking/jogging trails. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. PublicRemarks: Bright & Beautiful End Unit- Great Location & Schools!!  You'll love this light and bright end of row townhouse's gleaming hardwood floors, designer paint, plus all of the new LED light fixtures and high end finishes.  The classic kitchen boasts real wood cabinets, a pantry, new fixtures, and table space by the bay window; the down/up blinds make this the perfect morning coffee spot.  The open concept living/dining area enjoy lots of natural light from the tall windows overlooking the quiet community.   The spacious primary suite extends the length of the house, has ample closet space, and boasts a brand new bath with stall shower.  The two generously sized guest bedrooms share a full sized fully renovated hall bath.   Downstairs, there is a huge walkout level rec-room with more recessed lights, a fireplace, and a window wall that opens to a full sized, fully fenced patio.   An updated half bath and laundry/storage room with newer washer and dryer complete the first floor.   This quiet community, located on a dead end residential street with plenty of guest parking, comes with one assigned space, commuter bus stops, a sports court, ball field, and paths that lead to stunning lake royal park.  With a half mile, you can walk to Target, Burke Center Rail Station & Farmer's Market, Bunnyman Breweing or Bowl America.  Close to GMU & City of Fairfax; close to 495,  66, 123  for a quick commute in any direction.

Schedule a viewing today and experience all that 37 S Hudson St has to offer!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to 12844 Williams Meadow Ct, Herndon, VA, a stunning rental located in the prestigious Monroe Chase community. This beautiful brick front single-family home features 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and a two-car garage, all situated on a quiet cul-de-sac. The formal living and dining room combination is perfect for accommodating large family gatherings. The main level also includes a convenient office, ideal for working from home. The spacious kitchen is a chef's delight, featuring stainless steel appliances, ample cabinets, recessed lighting, a desk, a kitchen island, a breakfast bar, a pantry, an oversized breakfast nook, and walk-out access to the backyard. Upstairs, the huge primary bedroom suite features a tray ceiling, a walk-in closet, and a private luxury bath with double vanities, a separate tub, and a shower. The secondary bedrooms provide plenty of room for sleep, storage, or play. The large finished lower level offers a family-sized recreation room, a full bath, and walk-up access to the backyard. The fenced backyard offers plenty of privacy with natural trees. Conveniently located near Route 28, Route 50, Dulles Toll Road, I-66, shops, and restaurants, this home is just a short drive to Dulles Airport and less than 3 miles from the Metro. Please note, no pets allowed. Don't miss the opportunity to make this exquisite home yours!

PublicRemarks: Welcome to your new home in the highly sought-after Broyhill's McLean Estates! This spacious 4-bedroom, 3-bath split-level residence boasts an open floorplan perfect for modern living. The updated kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a stylish tile backsplash and floor, a seated island, and elegant granite countertops. The inviting living room, complete with a cozy fireplace, flows seamlessly into the dining area, ideal for family gatherings and entertaining. Enjoy the neutral paint palette throughout, providing a blank canvas for your personal touches. Step outside to the expansive covered rear porch and stone patio, perfect for relaxing or hosting outdoor events. The large yard, shaded by mature trees, offers ample space for gardening, play, or simply unwinding. Additional conveniences include a 1-car attached garage.  Nestled between Dolley Madison Boulevard and Chain Bridge Road, Broyhill's McLean Estates is a prime location near Downtown McLean. Residents relish the close proximity to Tyson’s Corner Mall and Galleria, as well as the short commute to Washington DC and Arlington. Commuters will appreciate the easy access to I-495 and the convenience of being near two major airports – Reagan National to the east and Dulles International to the west. Experience the perfect blend of space, community, and convenience in Broyhill's McLean Estates. This home is ideal for anyone looking to be part of a welcoming neighborhood while enjoying the benefits of modern amenities and proximity to urban centers. Don’t miss out on this exceptional property!

AgentRemarks: SCHEDULE ONLINE - instructions for access to property in Showingtime **SEE DOCUMENTS for (1) Application Instructions and Pet Policy/Procedures & (2) Resident Brochure with details on our benefits package and $0 Security Deposit Option **FAST Application Processing------------------------------------------------------------------------------------$0 Security Deposit Option for Qualified Residents! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Pet-Friendly Pet Policy- This home is pet-friendly and will accept a maximum of 2 pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20 for the 1st pet and $15 for the 2nd pet. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. Real Property Management Pros does accept assistant animals per state and federal guidelines. If you have an assistance animal, you must still complete an online animal profile. There is no application fee for this process.

PublicRemarks: Welcome home! This top floor 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom condo PLUS den is stunning, with high ceilings and an abundance of natural lighting. Gorgeous wood floors greet you at the front door and lead you into the combined living and dining rooms, perfect for entertaining family and friends. The living room features vaulted ceilings, track lighting, and a wood burning fireplace you’ll enjoy in these cooler months! The open kitchen includes stainless steel appliances, granite countertops, and a handsome stone tile backsplash. Down the hall, the spacious primary bedroom boasts large windows, flooding the room with natural light. Inside the elegant en suite bathroom, you’ll find a wide double sink vanity with granite countertops, a walk-in shower with stylish tilework, and a large walk-in closet with a custom closet system. The light-filled den is a fantastic addition and could be an ideal home office, exercise room, or nursery and has a massive walk-in storage closet for your convenience. On the other side of the unit, the second bathroom is sizable and bright with two closets. The second full bathroom includes modern fixtures and a privacy door for the shower. This condo also features a large in-unit laundry room with a full size washer dryer and multiple large closets. One garage parking space #546 and one visitor pass. Community amenities are abundant and include an outdoor pool, hot tub, sauna, fitness center, party room, dog park, basketball court, grilling & picnic areas, playground, and car washing station. The daily shuttle to the Pentagon City Metro makes this a commuter’s dream (M-F every half hour from 6:30-9:30am and 4:30-7:30pm)! Minutes to The Pentagon, Mark Center, Amazon HQ2, The Village at Shirlington, Pentagon City, Old Town Alexandria, and Downtown DC. Enjoy local trails at Fort Ward Park and Barcroft Park. One mile from the Bradlee Center and Bailey's Crossroads and all your shopping needs: Target, HomeGoods, World Market, CVS, TJMax, Burlington Coat Factory, Harris Teeter, Fresh Market, Starbucks, the new Silver Diner, Xsport, and OrangeTheory. Quick access to I-395, Van Dorn St, Rte 7, Braddock Rd, Seminary Rd, I-495, and I-66 and more! Community is welcoming, social, and VERY pet friendly!

You'll love living in this spacious condo and do not want to miss this opportunity!

Spa like tub with separate glass stand in shower, his/her separate walking in closets, Lots of space, designer touches, recessed lights, a tesla charger, & the list continues! Separate Laundry room is located on upper floor. Follow downstairs to newly 2022 fully finished basement! Media room is furnished with 5.1.2 Sonance speaker (7 built in speakers ) with Onkyo amplifier, Epson projector, 6 reclining chairs, 145" screen for your game watching/movie nights! Luxury Vinyl plank in rec room with 185" screen, 7.2 Pols speakers and Denin Amplifier (to be configured), Table tennis table & cascade basketball game! This level also has a full bath. Lots of open lush green space, tots play area, trail & access to the Goose Creek for residents only! Walking to shopping, dining, beaver dam for kayaking, Short distance to Ashburn Metro, farmers market, minutes to shopping, dining, convenience shops, recreational facilities, 2 minutes to toll rd, minutes to Rt. 28, Dulles international airport! The home is very conveniently set in the area's prime & rolling landscape of Loudoun County the home offers a breath of fresh air and broader horizons! Loudoun is a must-visit destination for lovers of artisanal, epicurean and culturally rich experiences. Loudoun County has attractions for outdoor enthusiasts, foodies, beer and wine aficionados and history buffs alike. Within minutes enjoy the beautiful vineyards, horses, farms & so much more! See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Resident Benefits Package is Required with ALL lease agreements managed by Real Property Management Pros. The Real Property Management Pros Resident Benefits Package (RBP) delivers savings and convenient, professional services that make taking care of your home second nature. By applying, Applicant agrees to be enrolled and to pay the applicable cost of $45.95/month, payable with rent. Your RBP may include, subject to property mechanicals or other limitations: - Renters Insurance that meets all lease requirements from an A-rated carrier - HVAC air filter delivery directly to your door approximately every 90 days. - Move-in concierge service: one call set up your utility services, cable, and internet services - A resident rewards program that helps you earn rewards for paying your rent on time. - Credit building to help boost your credit score with timely rent payments. - $1M Identity Protection for all adult leaseholders - 24/7 online maintenance reporting - Home buying assistance for when the time is right to buy your “forever” home. - Online portal: Access to your account, documents, communication and payment options. - Vetted vendor network: we find the technicians who are reputable, licensed, and insured. NOTE: The total monthly cost of the Resident Benefits Package is all-inclusive, and no discounts will be given if any element of the package is unavailable due to a lack of HVAC or another limitation at a specific property. See resident brochure or property manager website for more details.--------------------------------------------------------Pet-Friendly Pet Policy- This home is pet-friendly and will accept pets that are at least 1-year old. You will need to complete an online pet profile and pay a non-refundable pet application fee of $20. If your pet is approved, you will need to pay a non-refundable pet fee of $350 per pet plus a monthly pet administration fee of $30 per pet. PublicRemarks: Sunny Shirlington End Unit- Backs to Park! The  light and bright living room enjoys wood floors and tree top views; up the center level steps , you''' find an eat in kitchen with modern cabinets, granite counters , stainless steel appliances, and a outdoor access.  You'll love the fully fences backyards patios, mature trees, and privacy fence with gated access to Fort Bernard Park.  The upper floors have two bedrooms on their own level with an updated full bath while the third bedroom and second bath occupy the bottom floors.  Popular location just a 10 minute from Shirlington's shopping, dining, entertainment, dog park, and trail head. Easy access to 395 & S Glebe for quick trips to Pentagon/Crystal City, DC, Potomac Yard, and Raegan National Airport.

PublicRemarks: Nestled on a picturesque .50-acre lot on one of Vienna's most beautiful streets, this enchanting custom craftsman-style home offers a superb location just minutes from Vienna shopping centers, Tysons Corner, the W&OD Trail, and fresh markets. The charming, quiet neighborhood is perfect for those seeking tranquility. As you approach the home, the flickering gas light in the front yard and the meticulously maintained front garden provide a sense of privacy and lead you to the inviting front porch. Inside, you'll find four levels of luxury, featuring huge windows, unique nooks and crannies, angled turrets, and exquisite details throughout. The foyer opens to a stunning curved staircase, an octagon living room with a gas fireplace, and a formal dining room. The main level boasts a primary suite with a walk-in closet and a grand bathroom complete with a soaking tub and shower. The gourmet kitchen is a chef's dream, featuring a SubZero refrigerator, a custom pull-out spice rack, a large island, and a morning area that opens to a bright great room with cathedral ceilings, skylights, a wood fireplace, a bar area with plumbing for a sink, and an arched window wall. Sliding doors from the kitchen lead to a huge deck, perfect for outdoor dining, entertainment, and relaxation, including a spa deck with a hot tub overlooking the garden, tall trees, flagstone walkways, and a patio with a fountain and outdoor lighting. The upper level features a second primary suite with a walk-in closet and a recently renovated grand bath with a Jacuzzi and steam shower. Additionally, there are two bedrooms, one with a balcony and a spiral staircase leading to the loft level, perfect for an artist's studio, playroom, or den. The lower level offers two outdoor entrances, a rec room, exercise area, den, office, media lounge with a barrel-vault ceiling wine cellar, a large workshop room, and ample storage. Built-in speakers are available in the living room, dining room, family room, and outdoors, providing a seamless audio experience throughout the home. 6-12 Month Rental Term.

AgentRemarks: Discover a fantastic rental opportunity in Dumfries, Virginia! This young single-family offers spacious living with four bedrooms, three and a half baths, a finished walk-up basement, and over 2,900 finished square feet. The open-concept design features a massive kitchen island, new hard-surface flooring, and modern amenities including a gas fireplace, interior sound system, and more. Located in the resort-style community of Potomac Shores, enjoy a front porch, a deck, a fenced backyard, and a two-car tandem garage.  The HOA fee includes high-speed internet, trash service, a gym, miles of nature trails, The Shores Club access, two pool complexes, and numerous social events. Future community enhancements include a new VRE Station, a town center, and a waterfront park. Don't miss this opportunity – schedule your viewing today!
PublicRemarks: Looking for the perfect rental in the Dumfries, Virginia area? Look no further!  You'll love the beautiful tree-lined streets and sidewalks in the amenity-rich, resort-style community of Potomac Shores. The home boasts a charming front porch, a deck off the family room, and a fenced backyard – ideal for outdoor living. The tandem car garage is perfect for hobbyists or those with extra vehicles. Additionally, there’s a spacious driveway for extra parking.  Inside, the Hampton floor plan offers an open-concept design with a massive kitchen island, perfect for entertaining. With over 2,900 finished square feet, this home includes four bedrooms, 3 1/2 baths, a finished walk-up basement, and new hard-surface flooring on the main and lower levels. Cozy up by the gas fireplace or enjoy the modern conveniences of an interior sound system, fire suppression system, Low-E windows, and rough-in plumbing for a future lower-level bar. Potomac Shores' HOA fee covers high-speed internet, trash service, a gym, miles of nature trails, access to The Shores Club, Social Barns, two pool complexes, and numerous resident-sponsored social events, clubs, and classes. The community will soon feature a new VRE Station, a Day to Night Town Center, a raised boardwalk, and a waterfront park along the Potomac River. Don't miss out on this fantastic rental opportunity – schedule your viewing today!

PublicRemarks: **Welcome to Broadlands!**  6-month and 9-month lease options are available .... Location, location, location! Available for immediate move-in! Rent includes high-speed 1 GBPS Verizon internet. Mill Run, Eagle Ridge, and Briar Woods LCPS pyramid !!!! Presenting a stunning Decatur model built by Van Metre, perfect for entertaining with its expansive 2,928 sq ft. This impressive home features 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, and is one of the largest townhome models with a 3-level bump-out extension in sought-after Broadlands.  Conveniently located just 2 miles from the Silver Line Metro/Ashburn Station, 7 miles from Dulles International Airport, and with easy access to the Dulles Toll Road (Rt 267) and Rt 28. Close to shops, restaurants, entertainment, and within the highly sought-after Mill Run, Eagle Ridge, and Briar Woods LCPS pyramid. Additionally, it’s near multiple national grocery stores, restaurants, movie theaters, and hospitals. The home has been freshly painted throughout, including the garage, and boasts new carpet on all floors. It has been meticulously power washed, including windows, doors, exterior, and driveway.  The main level boasts formal living and dining rooms, a cozy family room off the kitchen, and a sunroom with a gas fireplace. The upstairs primary suite, one of the largest for townhomes, features walk-in closets and an attached bath with a jetted soaking tub, standing shower with glass surround, and double vanity. There’s enough space for a seating area or office. Two spacious secondary bedrooms with vaulted ceilings share a full hall bathroom, and the laundry room, featuring a washer and dryer , is conveniently located on the bedroom level. Recessed lights in the living area, kitchen, and master bedroom ensure ample lighting throughout, eliminating the need for floor lamps. Enjoy the outdoors with a nice deck and fenced backyard. The lower walk-out level includes new carpet flooring and lighting throughout. It features a spacious recreation room, a legal 4th bedroom, a full bathroom, and a den. Additional highlights include an electric car charger (Tesla, etc.), Nest Thermostat, Nest Doorbell, smart switches in the bedrooms, fans in all bedrooms, $125 for Appliance service fee call. The HOA includes Verizon high-speed internet and access to incredible community amenities such as 3 pools, various tot lots, trails/paths, tennis and sports courts, a fitness center, a nature center, a community center, events, and much more. Requirements :  - Credit score of 700 + - Income at least 2.5 X the rent - No bankruptcy or eviction records Hurry… you don't want to miss this beautiful home!

Tenants that do not upload their own renters insurance to the Tenant portal 5 days prior to move in will be automatically included in the RBP and the renters insurance program. More details upon application.

AgentRemarks: Nestled in the vibrant heart of Fair Lakes, this exquisite 2-car garaged townhome is a sanctuary of modern living. With three spacious bedrooms and two full plus two half baths, it offers a harmonious blend of comfort and style. The foyer and living room greet you with the warmth of hardwood floors, while the upper level is a cozy retreat with plush carpeting. The gourmet kitchen is a culinary artist’s dream, leading to a private deck perfect for serene mornings and tranquil evenings. The family room, with its inviting fireplace, promises cozy gatherings and cherished memories. Convenience is at your doorstep with the Fair Lakes Shopping Center just a stone’s throw away. The second and third bedrooms, bathed in natural light and boasting vaulted ceilings, provide a peaceful haven. The upper-level laundry, equipped with a full-sized washer and dryer, adds to the home’s practicality. An attic fan ensures cool comfort during the summer months. For those who work from home, the lower level features a convenient office room, providing a quiet and productive workspace adjacent to a spacious recreational room. Stay ahead of the curve with AI-ready features. Connected devices seamlessly integrate into your lifestyle, from smart refrigerators to fans, reducing energy while maintaining style and comfort. Security and convenience are paramount: a smart door lock provides peace of mind, and garage doors can be controlled remotely. Plus, the oversized garage features storage racks for convenient, organized storage. Recent updates include a new roof in 2019, a water heater in 2020,  both a refrigerator and dishwasher in 2021, new washer replaced in 2023,  ensuring this home is as efficient as it is beautiful.

PublicRemarks: *This Home is also available for short-term rent. Payment will be adjusted*  Welcome to this exceptional rental opportunity in Arcola Town Center! This brand-new, never-lived-in end-row townhome boasts luxury and convenience. With 4 bedrooms, 3 full baths, and one half bath, this home offers ample space for comfortable living. The upper level features 3 bedrooms and 2 full bathrooms, including a spacious primary bedroom with a large full bathroom equipped with a stand-up shower and double sinks. The convenience continues with two brand-new washers and dryers on the upper floor. The main floor showcases an elegant open floor plan connecting the dining area, kitchen, and family room, along with a half bathroom and a full deck. The chef-inspired kitchen is equipped with a cooktop, 2 wall ovens, a built-in microwave, a dishwasher, and a stunning island, perfect for culinary endeavors. The first floor houses the 4th bedroom, 3rd full bath, and access to the two-car garage. Situated in the vibrant Arcola Town Center development, this home offers proximity to a brewery, gym, schools, and the Loudoun County Parkway, Dulles Landing, and International Airport IAD, making it an ideal place to call home. Don't miss out on the opportunity to move into this turnkey property! * The Landlord Will purchase a home warranty, the tenant will be responsible for the service call fee, this fee is not reimbursed by the landlord* We do not accept Rentspree applications, please contact us for the link.
